show on the task bar and still show the tab when i hover my mouse over it but when i clicked it it did nothing check to see if you have a window that is moved off screen \( or located on another monitor \) right click the taskbar icon 's thumbnail when you have raised it and choose move from the thumbnail 's window menu notice the change in mouse pointer but in your case you can not use it to drag what you can do however is use a cursor key to engage the mouse pointer on the window 's title bar for a drag move then drag move the window into view in the case where the window is on a different monitor you would also have the \( simpler \) alternative of using a win shift cursor move good luck glenn aldwinckle __eou__

hello edgar banks , welcome to the skype community forum ! i do understand the inconvenience you have faced to resolve audio issues on skype calls , you and the person you re calling should follow the steps below 1 use the latest version of skype we 're always improving call quality , so for best performance , make sure that you and the person you 're calling are using the latest version of skype download the latest version 2 check your connection if your audio or video calls freeze , your video looks block like or has motion blur , it might be your internet connection \( or your friend 's \) causing the problem if skype detects a weak connection , it will reduce the quality to try and stop the call from dropping altogether using a computer \? plug your ethernet cable directly into your modem or router if you 're using wi fi , try moving closer to the router if you 're not connected , the windows 10 guide why ca n't i get online \? will give you tips to fix any connection issues using a mobile device \? use a speed test app to check the performance of your mobile connection , and check the result against the download and upload speeds required for skype 3 is another application interfering with your call \? close any applications that could be interfering with your call file sharing applications , streaming audio or video , or even just having a web browser open are all things that can eat up bandwidth to troubleshoot problems with skype calls , please refer to this link troubleshooting problems with skype calls i hope this helps should you have further queries , please do not hesitate to reply to this post thank you __eou__

none of those solutions changed anything , my intetnet speeds are way faster than needed fir skype both of us are using the latest version of skype and nothing is interrupting the call as i said earlier , it 's only this one person it does n't happen with anyone else __eou__

i'm a web developer and i'm making a website , however , on microsoft edge the favicon next to the title of the website in the tab wo n't show up , however on firefox it shows my website favicon have a look at the screenshots to see what i'm talking about the first link is what it looks like in microsoft edge and the second like is what it looks like on firefox https prnt sc goz5dt https prnt sc goz5ro post moved by the moderator to the appropriate forum category moved from internet explorer internet explorer 11 windows 10 __eou__

there are several techniques over time that web developers have used to put a favicon on their pages but \( somewhat \) recently the standards committee has addressed this and have come up with a recommendation http www w3 org 2005 10 howto favicon essentially , they recommend that you use the following link href favicon ico rel icon type image x icon i follow this and my sites show favicons __eou__

there are several categories of things that can lead to the favicon not appearing perhaps most notably , ms browsers still do not seem to support internationalized urls \( iris \) in favicon links here is a mid 2015 ms connect thread discussing the issue https connect microsoft com ie feedback details 1434088 here is a demo which was posted there the favicon appears correctly with firefox and chrome it is absent in ie and ms edge browsers https prunemaster github io snippets favicon iri favicon href utf8 html here 's the icon see \? nothing faulty about it ico __eou__
ok , thanks everyone __eou__

hello , thank you for visiting microsoft community as per the description , i understand that you would like to remove toolbar that pops up every time you to a website i will certainly help you with the issue i would like to know a few information amyso , i would suggest you to follow the steps mentioned below method 1 i would suggest you to run virus scan to make sure the computer is free from virus the microsoft safety scanner is a free downloadable security tool that provides on demand scanning and helps remove virus , spyware , and other malicious software it works with your existing antivirus software http www microsoft com security scanner en us default aspx note 1 \) the microsoft safety scanner expires 10 days after being downloaded to rerun a scan with the latest anti malware definitions , download and run the microsoft safety scanner again 2 \) if you run the virus scan the program that is infected with virus will get deleted so you have to reinstall the program alamyso if the files and folders are affected with virus then they might even get deleted method 2 refer to the link mentioned below and check if that helps https technet microsoft com en us magazine dd364987 aspx hope this information helps please provide us the required information to search more about this and understand the issue more clearly and we will be glad to offer our assistance thank you sincerely , ankitrandall rajput __eou__

i 'd start with task manager press control alt delete and click task manager the various tabs in taskman will show you which programs processes services are eating the most memory and cpu time i 'd first check the performance tab and click memory to make sure that nothing 's eating all or most all of available memory , then go to the processes tab and click cpu to sort the list from highest to lowest percentage look for processes that are eating lots of cpu time __eou__

ok , so here is the problem , which honestly i 've had for months now i was trying to cleanup some files on my computer , well i read somewhere that you do n't need your temp folder so i deleted it i also read something about startmenu folder taking up a lot of space so i deleted it , it ask for administrator permission so i clicked ok and it deleted the files , not only that but i deleted it from my recycle bin really important things such as desktop and shop were gone ! i was able to get desktop back from another forum post that had a download which currently now is fine , but that not the worst part , my change pc setting 's is gone as well , when i click it nothing happens and i mean nothing if i also try changing my account picture on the metro screen as well nothing happens just nothing if anyone has a solution please post it , also another thing that has been happening rapidly every time i turn off my pc the next day i turn it on my wifi is disconnected , if it 's not then in the middle of the day it will say wifi name limited and i get disconnected , what does it mean and how do i fix it , i 've run virus scans with norton and nothing has come up well something but i fixed it , anyways please help ! ! ! __eou__

marian , do the following system restore takes about ten minutes to run during which the computer will reboot , you may be faced at some point with a black screen where nothing appears to be happening , but eventually , the usual lock screen will appear once more check to make sure both folders are back again to remove files which are safe to delete , do the following do n't listen to dummies on forums who tell you it 's ok to delete certain files and folders because half the time , they do n't have a clue of what they 're talking about you can always come to this forum for advice if you need it __eou__
thank you for the reply and sadly the only restore points were from a few days ago , also the files are not gone they were restored but missing lot 's of things __eou__

mariany , when you run system restore , it winds back the clock to the date you choose so only the files which were there on that date are restored , anything you installed after that date wo n't appear anymore and will have to be reinstalled if the temp and startup folders have n't come back , you can undo the restoration by running the same menu again you 'll see the option to undo when you click the system restore button that way , you 'll get your missing files back again you could try looking in the recycle bin to see if they 're in there if they are , right click them and choose restore windows will replace them in the same location they were removed from __eou__
again this happened a few months ago , my recycle bin is empty and there is no date before the delete __eou__

some files can be deleted from the temp folder , but not the folder itself because windows uses it to hold temporary files in it 's a bit like your car and it 's gas tank you can drain it , but you still have a fully functional automobile but if you remove the gas tank , then you 're not going to be going anywhere until you replace it you now find yourself in that situation with your computer until you replace the temp folder and its contents , your machine is not going to function properly i think you 're looking at having to refresh the system in order to get it going again what you 'll have to do first is to create a recovery disk and copy the manufacturer 's partition to that this means you 'll have to go buy an external hard drive with at least 60gb free but bearing in mind that the cost of a 60gb hard disk and one with a 500gb capacity is barely a matter of cents , you 'll be better off with the large capacity drive which you can use for other purposes later to create the recovery drive , hit windows key to open the start screen with the tiles and start typing the word recovery you 'll see the option called create a recovery drive appear on the right click that and then click next here 's a screenshot then follow instructions in this article http windows microsoft com en gb windows 8 restore refresh reset pc __eou__

i am currently using the following formula to count how often a certain month is listed in a spreadsheet sumproduct \( 1 \( month \( c4 j13 \) 11 \) \) i have been updated the 11 at the end for each month and it works perfectly except for 1 for january i receive a very wrong number can anyone advise as to why 1 is n't counting the january cells \? i ca n't even tell where the number it 's getting is coming from __eou__

the month \( \) always counts a blank cell as 1 you need to use this for your blank related data table sumproduct \( 1 \( month \( c 4 j 13 \) 1 \) \( c 4 j 13 \) \) __eou__

since you are now doing a mathematical operation with \( month \( c 4 j 13 \) 1 \) \( c 4 j 13 \) , the initial 1 is superfluous this works sumproduct \( \( month \( c 4 j 13 \) 1 \) \( c 4 j 13 \) \) best wishes __eou__

hi i'm trying to import a text file into excel but having problems with delimiters here 's a simplified example of the file i'm trying to import look simple but the problem is that the file sometimes uses tab as a delimiter and sometimes used spaces , so i import and get results like i 've tried using the custom delimiter but ca n't get it to work and the online documentation is pretty useless any advice thanks ! __eou__

hello , in a delimited file , there should only ever be one type of delimiter a mix of different delimiters , i e tab or single space will always cause issues i suggest you open the file with the delimiter set to a character that you know does not exist in the dataset , for example a pipe symbol then all data opens in one column next , do a replace values and replace all space characters with tabs after that , use the split column command to split using the tab character here is the complete m code let source csv document \( file contents \( c datacarsales txt \) , delimiter , columns 1 , encoding 1252 , quotestyle quotestyle none \) , replaced value table replacevalue \( source , , \( tab \) , replacer replacetext , column1 \) , split column by delimiter table splitcolumn \( replaced value , column1 , splitter splittextbydelimiter \( \( tab \) , quotestyle csv \) , column1 1 , column1 2 , column1 3 \) , changed type table transformcolumntypes \( split column by delimiter , column1 1 , type text , column1 2 , int64 type , column1 3 , type number \) in changed type __eou__

teylyn , thanks very much for this i'm surprised how limited the custom delimiter functionality is in power query i'm new to power query , but is seems an excellent tool , and the sort of problem i posted is not uncommon when you 're dealing with files from multiple sources who create these files manually \( e g insurance company receiving many data files from small brokers underwriters \) your workaround , however , does the trick it 's very similar to the way i used to deal with this sort of issues , i e with an excel macro __eou__

hello again , thanks for the feedback the custom delimiter option gives you the tool to determine what character is used as the delimiter in your data set it does not cover the possibilities of mixed delimiters in a data source mixing delimiters is not good practice and should be discouraged the custom delimiter in power query is actually quite powerful , because you can define a delimiter that contains more than one character , thus saving additional steps to clean up the resulting data so , the delimiter could be a string like \( i e space , space , dash , space , space \) and power query will happily slice the data when it finds that string , whereas importing a file with the old tools only allowed for one character to be the delimiter but the delimiter must always be the same throughout the data set that 's the whole idea of a delimiter files from multiple sources can easily be handled with power query each file may need different handling for delimiters etc take each file at a time and determine its delimiter then combine the results of different queries as required __eou__

the message referring to a subscription would indicate this is an office 365 installation which requires renewal on a monthly or yearly basis as michael says this product key is not the windows activation key but is the same format \( 5 x 5 alphanumeric characters \) and has no zero or o character in it if it is an office 365 subscription then it is almost certainly based on his microsoft account login and without those credentials you would not be able to renew it hence the not associated message , he has the subscription not you you would have to buy your own subscription and reinstall office from your login generally speaking the advice when getting a second hand computer is to reset windows completely and remove anything installed after it factory load __eou__

is it possible to use both sum and count at the same time \? for example , sum the cost column but also count how many entries from another column \? thank you jane __eou__

you want one cell to both sum and count \? it 's possible , but not recommended as it could be confusing for anyone reading it you can just combine the two functions into one formula sum \( a2 a5 \) count \( b2 b5 \) or to make it easier to read sum sum \( a2 a5 \) count count \( b2 b5 \) __eou__

for column a , use the counta function \( counta counts not just numbers , but any cells that are n't empty \) , and for column b , use the sum function in the row after the last row of data , \( i 'll assume you have row 1 with the titles and the data is in rows 2 through 101 \) , put this in cell a102 counta \( a2 a101 \) and in b102 sum \( b2 b101 \) __eou__

have a go with this it 'll save the slides from each of your custom shows out to a separate presentation watch out for linebreaks that the forum editor helpfully introduces option explicit sub whoisinslideshow \( \) dim opres as presentation dim ocopypres as presentation dim lshownum as long dim x as long set opres activepresentation with opres ' do n't do anything if there are no custom shows ! if slideshowsettings namedslideshows count 0 then ' we have shows work with each of them in turn for lshownum 1 to slideshowsettings namedslideshows count opres savecopyas opres path show cstr \( lshownum \) opres name set ocopypres presentations open \( opres path show cstr \( lshownum \) opres name \) with ocopypres for x slides count to 1 step 1 ' is this slide part of the current custom show \? ' if not , delete it if not isincustomshow \( slides \( x \) slideid , lshownum \) then slides \( x \) delete end if next save ' close end with ' copy presentation next ' custom show end if ' has custom shows end with ' opres , current presentation end sub function isincustomshow \( lslideid as long , lshownum as long \) as boolean dim x as long for x 1 to ubound \( activepresentation slideshowsettings namedslideshows \( lshownum \) slideids \) if lslideid activepresentation slideshowsettings namedslideshows \( lshownum \) slideids \( x \) then isincustomshow true exit function end if next end function __eou__

i have a formula that multiplies the contents of 3 cells the result of the formula is incorrect when checked by a calculator it goes like this e11 b13 b14 e11 contains its own formula \( b11 d11 \) e10 b11 and d11 are inputted values , and e10 is a formula \( b10 d10 \) e9 simple right \? but when i use a calculator to do the math , using the values displayed in each of these cells , i get a different result than what the formula gives __eou__
what values are showing in all of those cells \? __eou__
e11 shows 51 , 452 b13 shows 3 , 000 b14 shows 15 b11 shows 75 d11 shows 1 e10 shows 67 , 700 b10 shows 75 d10 shows 0 e9 shows 90 , 267 __eou__

i think it 's due to how you have the numbers formatted in those cells there are no decimals in your numbers in the above post , but the result of the formula in cell e10 should be 67 , 700 25 instead of 67 , 700 \( 90 , 267 75 67 , 700 25 \) that is assuming the starting number in e9 is 90 , 267 without decimals so even though you do n't see the decimals in the cell , the formula includes the decimals if you format your cells to show two decimal places , and enter those numbers in the calculator , they will match __eou__

hi it 's little trickier than just a single formula and how you do it depends on how you lay out your table of information let 's say you have a table that has the data that starts in cell c6 column b has the dates of the events in it row 2 has the list of players in it cell c6 and all of the other events that have happened have a number in it , either 1 , 75 , 5 , or 0 in cell c3 , put in a formula that adds up the player 's attendances \( numbers in the same column \) in cell c4 , put in a counta formula that adds up the number of cells in that column with something other than blank in it in cell c5 , put in a formula that divides c3 by c4 format that row as a percentage then , hide rows 3 4 i have n't given you all the details , let me know if you have any other questions about this __eou__

thank you for posting in microsoft community we understand that your windows 10 computer and ms edge has become slow we ll certainly help you with this method 1 run the system maintenance troubleshooter 1 press windows key x 2 click on control panel 3 select troubleshooting 4 on the left pane , click on view all 5 click on system maintenance to run the troubleshooter method 2 reset the microsoft edge i would suggest you to reset the microsoft edge and see if it helps note resetting the microsoft edge will remove your bookmarks and history follow the instruction provided below and check a navigate to the following location c users username appdatalocalpackagesmicrosoft microsoftedge 8wekyb3d8bbwe b delete everything in this folder c now press windows key and type windows powershell in search box d right click on windows powershell and select run as administrator e copy and paste the following command get appxpackage allusers name microsoft microsoftedge foreach add appxpackage disabledevelopmentmode register \( installlocation \) appxmanifest xml verbose disclaimer the reset edge settings feature might reset security settings or privacy settings that you added to the list of trusted sites the reset edge settings feature might also reset parental control settings we recommend that you note these sites before you use the reset edge settings feature resetting edge is n't reversible , and all previous settings are lost after reset to back up favorites in the edge follow the steps below 1 open file explorer , copy and paste the folder location below in the address bar , and press enter localappdata packagesmicrosoft microsoftedge 8wekyb3d8bbweacmicrosoftedgeuserdefault 2 copy the favorites folder to a place where you like to save your backup hope this will help you keep us posted with the status of the issue we ll be glad to assist if you need further assistance thank you __eou__

hi , i have heard of this problem before but never seen it as a sensible precaution make a backup of you workbook ensure the problem worksheet is the active \( visible \) sheet and try this vb code alt f11 to open vb editor right click 'thisworkbook' and insert module and paste the code below in on the right while still in vb editor , tap the f5 key to run the code , it should run very quickly so do n't be surprised if nothing seems to have happened go back to the worksheet and test your comments sub repaircomments \( \) dim cmntrange as range dim c as range dim cmnt as string on error resume next set cmntrange activesheet cells specialcells \( xlcelltypecomments \) if cmntrange is nothing then msgbox no comments on sheet exit sub end if for each c in cmntrange cmnt c comment text c comment delete c addcomment c comment text text cmnt next end sub __eou__
i had this problem today it turns out that i had accidentally grouped two worksheets when i ungrouped the sheets , everything worked just fine __eou__

hi , location , location , location when you conduct a search , microsoft collects the following when you set your weather location the ip address is detected and the server nearest you is where the weather feed information is located if you ve allowed a microsoft service or application that uses bing services to access your location , the approximate location of your device will be sent to microsoft along with the search terms , time and date of your search , and a unique identifier generated by the microsoft service or application mapping features in microsoft 's services and apps also use bing services , and when you submit information such as an address to be viewed on a map , that service or application passes it to bing services for processing the location information sent to bing services will be used to provide and improve search and mapping results with your consent , some mobile applications that use bing services may collect more precise location information to provide a more relevant experience or provide enhanced features that rely on knowing your location also , if you connect a bing service or app to another service that has check in or reminder features , such as facebook or foursquare , when you use these features microsoft will store the approximate location of your device along with your microsoft account information http www microsoft com privacystatement en us bing default aspx i hope this helps __eou__

i'm trying to use data from one worksheet to create a summary of sorts in a new worksheet , with only certain columns in the summary worksheet being copied over , and only pulling data from rows that have a y value in column a \( versus a n value in column a \) someone told me to use either vlookup or index and match but these seem to be more useful for people looking up specific data i'm trying to copy multiple rows of data into a new worksheet but , again , only those with a particular value in the first column __eou__

on the data sheet , copy the column header \( field name \) of column a to a cell somewhere to the right of the data enter the value y in the cell below manually enter \( or copy paste \) the column headers \( field names \) that you want in the first row of the summary sheet they should be written exactly the same way as on the data sheet enter any value in one of the cells below \( in row 2 \) it does n't matter what click in one of the column headers on the summary sheet on the data tab , in the sort filter group , click advanced excel may protest if so , ignore that and click ok select the radio button 'copy to another location' click in the 'list range' box activate the data sheet , and select the data range , including the headers click in the 'criteria range' box activate the data sheet again , and select the copied field name with the cell below \( the one containing y \) click in the 'copy to' box select the column headers on the summary sheet click ok __eou__
thank you very much ! __eou__

hi , andre , follow these steps from bing support to remove files related to desktop reboot before re installing bing desktop 1 uninstall the bing desktop program and earlier versions a click start b type appwiz cpl in the search for programs and files box and then press enter c in the currently installed programs list , select bing desktop and then click remove d follow the on screen instructions to uninstall bing desktop from your computer note before proceeding to the next steps , please unhide your folders first to unhide folders , on your local folder , press alt tools folder option view show hidden files , folders and drives 2 browse your computer to c program files \( x86 \) then delete the bing desktop installer a click start b type c program files on the start search box c hit enter d look for the bing desktop folder e right click the bing desktop installer folder and click delete 3 remove bing desktop files in program data folder a click start b be sure to unhide all your folders c type 'c ' d select program data e then , open microsoft f delete the bing desktop folder 4 remove bing desktop files from the windows registry important the steps below contain information about modifying the registry before you modify the registry , make sure to back it up and make sure that you understand how to restore the registry if a problem occurs for information about how to back up , restore , and edit the registry , visit the following web site http support microsoft com kb 256986 a click the 'start' button , type regedit in the search text box , and then press 'enter' b in the 'user account control' dialog box , click 'continue' c expand the hkey current usersoftwaremicrosoft folder d underneath the microsoft folder , make sure that the msn toolbar , msn apps and bing bar folders are not present if the folders are present , right click on each folder then click 'delete' e expand the hkey local machine softwaremicrosoft folder f underneath the microsoft folder , make sure that the msn toolbar and msn apps folders are not present if the folders are present , right click on each folder then click 'delete' g close the registry editor window 5 to delete the bing the app data folders a click start type userprofile on the search for programs and files box then press enter on your keyboard b on the pop up window , locate the appdata folder if the folder is not present , make sure to show all hidden files and folders check this option by accessing organize folder and search options view tab c after opening the appdata folder , open local microsoft d locate the bing desktop folder then delete it reboot the computer and reinstall bing desktop http www bing com explore desktop __eou__

hi my system is as follows nokia lumia 2520 \( note , this is a tablet , not a mobile phone \) windows rt i have the above tablet and purchased the keyboard to accompany it the keyboard incidentally has a battery which complements the main battery in the tablet prior to a recent full system refresh , the battery meter displayed both on the windows 8 interface , but also in the notification area of the desktop recognised and displayed both batteries and gave a sensible total percentage charge for example , when both the tablet and keyboard batteries are quite fully charged , the overall charge is displayed as 100 or slightly less however , since the full system refresh , the overall charge percentage is making little sense for example , at the current time , charge percentages are as follows tablet battery 100 keyboard battery 1 overall charge 13 i am aware that the tablet battery provides significantly more battery time than the keyboard battery and so am confused as to why the overall charge displayed is so low prior to the full system refresh , i am very sure that in the scenario above for the tablet and keyboard battery charges , the overall charge would have more logically been far higher , perhaps at least 80 i did notice that the overall charge status in terms of 'plugged in charging not charging' seems to report the status of the keyboard battery , rather than the tablet battery and wonder if the battery meter is somehow inappropriately prioritising the keyboard battery , which is essentially a 'slave' battery would anybody therefore know why the above would be occurring and also perhaps how windows rt tends to handle dual batteries \? i can confirm that as of 19 01 16 , system update confirms the tablet is fully up to date , so i would assume that any previous fixes that may have been implemented are already installed thank you for your time best regards kim __eou__

hi jennifer rivett , welcome to skype community ! please consider the following troubleshooting steps 1 make sure skype is no longer open quit skype , then in the menu bar click go go to folder 2 type library application support skype into the box and click go 3 drag the file called shared xml to the trash 4 go to the folder that has your skype name , and locate config xml and drag it to the trash 5 click go go to folder from the menu bar again 6 type library application support and click enter 7 locate the skype folder and rename it to skype old 8 open your applications folder and drag your copy of skype to the trash 9 empty trash 10 download and install the latest version of skype i also suggest to sign out of the skype application on your mobile , and monitor if the issue will still persist please let me know what the result will be regards , __eou__

use this udf in vba pass to it the cell or value you are looking up , the range to look in and which column to return it will remove any duplicates so for your example , enter this in a cell myvlookup \( b2 , 'payment method' ! a2 c5 , 3 \) function myvlookup \( pvalue as string , pworkrng as range , pindex as long \) dim arr \( \) as string dim x as long dim rng as range dim xresult as string xresult for each rng in pworkrng if rng pvalue then if x 0 then redim preserve arr \( x \) arr \( x \) rng offset \( 0 , pindex 1 \) x x 1 else if ubound \( filter \( arr , rng offset \( 0 , pindex 1 \) \) \) 0 then 'not already in array redim preserve arr \( x \) arr \( x \) rng offset \( 0 , pindex 1 \) x x 1 end if end if end if next for x lbound \( arr \) to ubound \( arr \) xresult xresult , arr \( x \) next x xresult right \( xresult , len \( xresult \) 2 \) myvlookup xresult end function __eou__

hi , i 've been having this problem for a couple days now and it is pretty annoying whenever i use anything internet related , the dsl light on my modem begins flashing and i lose connection it comes back after almost 30 seconds but the same thing happens after a short while again even while writing this post , i got disconnected twice now i'm lost i 've tried using a different modem , i 've checked my cables \( no problem there \) , i reset my modem setting twice but it is no good either please , if anyone have encountered or know the solution to this problem , reply thanks in advance __eou__

hi , i can certainly understand your frustration however , make sure the right network adapter is being used some computers might have multiple network adapters for example , if you bought a new desktop computer and during the purchase you upgraded to a different network adapter , you most likely have an onboard network adapter \( a network adapter built onto your computer 's motherboard \) as well as a secondary network adapter inserted into an available slot in the computer you can verify this by looking for two network ports on the back of your computer \( network ports look like large phone jacks \) laptops normally have just one network port unless you re using a usb network adapter follow these steps to check and set the correct network adapter as default to set the default network adapter 1 open network connections by swiping in from the right edge of the screen , tapping search \( or if you 're using a mouse , pointing to the upper right corner of the screen , moving the mouse pointer down , and then clicking search \) , entering network connections in the search box , tapping or clicking settings , and then tapping or clicking view network connections 2 if multiple network adapters are installed , the default adapter will have a check mark and be labeled default 3 if the correct network adapter is listed as disabled , press and hold or right click it , and then tap or click enable 4 if the wrong network adapter is listed as the default , press and hold or right click the correct adapter , and then tap or click set as default connection make sure the network adapter is enabled 1 open network connections by swiping in from the right edge of the screen , tapping search \( or if you 're using a mouse , pointing to the upper right corner of the screen , moving the mouse pointer down , and then clicking search \) , entering network connections in the search box , tapping or clicking settings , and then tapping or clicking view network connections 2 press and hold or right click the network adapter , and then tap or click enable you might be asked for an admin password or to confirm your choice note if the network adapter isn t working properly , you might need to download and install the latest driver for it \( if you received an installation disc with the network adapter or with your computer , the driver might also be on the disc \) run the following trouble shooters mentioned in the below link a network troubleshooter b internet connections troubleshooter c network adaptor troubleshooter http windows microsoft com en us windows cant connect to network 1tc windows 8 you can also refer to the microsoft community link mentioned below for further reference http windows microsoft com en us windows network connection problem help network problems windows 81 v1h win81tab1 v2h win7tab1 v3h winvistatab1 v4h winxptab1 for further queries , please feel free to contact us we will be more than happy to help you __eou__

skypebrowserhost exe is a component of skype for windows desktop application which consolidates internet related operations in separate processes all crash reports show that skypebrowserhost exe is crashing on jscript9 dll component jscript9 dll is javascript component used when scripting is conducted using internet explorer jscript9 dll is updated whenever internet explorer is updated the version of internet explorer \( ie11 \) installed on your computer is about 2 years old and needs to be updated open windows update tool and make sure that all missing pending updates , incl updates for internet explorer are installed __eou__

i'm trying to count a range of values , for instance a1 a10 , but not count any rows that are hidden in that range is there a formula , to not count the hidden row \? thanks , deborah j __eou__

depends on what you want to do i 've included two scenarios here 1 the cells in your range are all numbers aggregate \( 2 , 5 , a1 a10 \) this will count the number of cells with numbers while only ignoring hidden rows any cells with error values or other aggregate functions will still be counted 2 the cells in your range contain both numbers and text aggregate \( 3 , 5 , a1 a10 \) this will count the number of cells that are not blank while only ignoring hidden rows any cells with error values or other aggregate functions will still be counted hope this helps __eou__
subtotal \( 102 , a1 a10 \) the 102 tells it to ignore hidden values in the count use just 2 to include hidden values in the count __eou__
i would use subtotal \( 103 d4 d10 \) __eou__

original title werfault exe error message that wo n't go away how do i eliminate the error message werfault exe application error the exception unknown software exception \( 0xc0000409 \) occurred in the application at location 0x3a2d1a74 i have windows 7 and this message keeps reappearing and slowing down my computer __eou__

hello patricia , it seems that you are having an issue connecting your facebook account to the bing bar due to script errors and there is no option to allow connection of bing to facebook if the only sign of a problem is the error message , and if the websites are working , you can probably ignore the error also , if you are referring to the allow button , please be advised that clicking on the okay button is as good as allowing bing connection to facebook let me walk you through on how you can connect your facebook account to the bing bar even if you encounter script error messages 1 \) sign in with your facebook account in the bing bar 2 \) when the bing would like to access your email address , messages and friend requests dialog appears and a script error that says an error has occurred in the script on this page overlaps the dialog , click on no button to stop running that script 3 \) click okay button to proceed 4 \) the page stating bing would like to post to your friends on your behalf will appear next again , click no and then the okay buttons to proceed 5 \) the following page will appear next , bing would like to manage your messages and manage your notifications like the previous steps , you must stop running the script on the page by clicking the no button click okay to proceed once done , you should be able to connect your facebook account to the bing bar successfully to troubleshoot your issue with the script errors , you may need to check this article for more information how to troubleshoot script errors in internet explorer thanks ! __eou__

i have a series of powerpoint presentations that are essentially troubleshooting guides with shapes that link to work instructions , videos , etc that are contained in other slides they are on the larger side \( between 50 and 200mb \) and have a few hundred slides each the presentations are stored in a onedrive for business folder when i try to view them using powerpoint online , the pages load very slowly when i click on a link , and occasionally the program times out and crashes this seems to happen regardless of file size or slide content i think i 've narrowed it down to an issue with the distance the link has to travel i created two test presentations , one with 100 slides and one with 5 they each have a title slide , a rectangle shape on slide 2 with a link to the last slide , and a slide that says the end at the end presentations a and b are 139 and 44kb , respectively clicking the link on slide 2 on a takes about 10 20 seconds to load the last slide , while b takes about 1 second once they are opened and i have navigated to that slide , the links are instantaneous is there some other way to link to different slides that wo n't cause this problem \? or , as an alternative , is there a way to cache the whole presentation up front so there is no wait time when links are clicked \? __eou__

for starters , skype has no phone technical support number performing a more thorough search should inform you that the number you are dialing is a scam number out to steal your information and money they have no access to your skype account or your computer unless you provide them with that information i have had a skype number for over a decade if you just set up a skype number it may take some time to activate initially \( possibly 24 hours or so \) if you are online in skype and people call that phone number from their mobile or landline number , your skype client should ring a skype number is an inbound only subscription a skype number by itself does include any ability to dial phone numbers for free that still requires credit or a subscription you may want to determine whether inbound call issues are solely related to the client version on your phone or its sleep status having a static client that is on 24x7 may prove to be more reliable for inbound calls as variables are reduced you may want to try a desktop or the web client just to see if calls are getting through on those skype clients if you need to get a hold of skype customer service , you can do so over live chat to do so , contact skype customer service for assistance to reach that support you simply need to choose the correct topic , sub topic and click on next to get a live chat option the best topic and sub topic for this issue would probably be payments orders help with a subscription __eou__

press alt f11 to activate the visual basic editor select insert module copy the following code into the code module function concatenateunique \( concatenaterange as range , optional separator as string , \) as variant dim i as long dim strresult as string dim dict as object on error goto errhandler set dict createobject \( scripting dictionary \) for i 1 to concatenaterange count if concatenaterange cells \( i \) value then if not dict exists \( concatenaterange cells \( i \) value \) then dict add key concatenaterange cells \( i \) value , item concatenaterange cells \( i \) value end if end if next i concatenateunique join \( dict keys , separator \) exit function errhandler concatenateunique cverr \( xlerrvalue \) end function press alt f4 to exit the visual basic editor enter the following formula in cell h10 of the top sheet , adjusting the range if necessary concatenateunique \( mwms ! k2 k100 , , \) make sure that you save the workbook as a macro enabled workbook \( xlsm \) and that you allow macros when you open it __eou__

i was able to resolve this problem by restoring the windows 7 to the restore point just before the recent windows update \( sep 13 \) the problem disappeared then i did a windows update and selected only one update at a time , downloaded and installed it , restarting windows after each update each time , i found there was no sign of the parsing error message when i had finally completed all 7 updates , everything was fine no more error message i concluded that some sort of downloading or installing error had occurred during the original set of seven updates , and that redoing the whole set from the beginning replaced whichever update had the error and solved the problem __eou__

my computer went so crazy last night that i went out and bought a new one this morning but now i read that the alerts i saw were fake and designed to get me to buy some software i was tricked into deleting some temp files anyway , how do i even get that computer back on the internet \? just plug it in \? if so , how do i tell that anything is working \? it says my files are all empty , but i read that they are just hidden __eou__

it sounds like you could have a virus or other malware get your antivirus program up to date and boot into safe mode note that some viruses can hide themselves from your antivirus program in normal mode , so you really need to scan in safe mode to get into safe mode when you first power up , hit f8 about once a second until you get the menu and select safe mode then run a full system scan microsoft has suggestions and offerings at http windows microsoft com en us windows7 how do i remove a computer virus forum moderator keith has some suggestions along this line at http answers microsoft com en us windows forum windows 7 performance windows explorer has stopped working 6ab02526 5071 4dcc 895f d90202bad8b3 if that fixes it , fine if not , use system restore to go back to a date prior to the beginning of the problem to run system restore , click start programs accessories system tools system restore click the box that says show more restore points you can check for corrupted system files open an administrator command prompt and run sfc if the above does n't help click start , then type sfc in the search box , right click sfc exe and click run as administrator then from the command prompt type sfc scannow finally if all else fails , you can check the rather cryptic system event log to do so click start control panel administrative tools event viewer once in event viewer click on the system log and scroll through the entries looking for those flagged error to see if you can find hints as to where the problem could be i hope this helps good luck __eou__

they give in above link note if sfc could not fix something , then run the command again to see if it may be able to the next time sometimes it may take running the sfc scannow command 3 times com tutorials 2293 refresh windows 8 a html refreshing your pc goes like this the pc boots into windows re \( recovery environment \) windows re scans the hard drive for your data , settings , and apps , and puts them aside \( on the same drive \) windows re installs a fresh copy of windows windows re restores the data , settings , and apps it has set aside into the newly installed copy of windows the pc restarts into the newly installed copy of windows how to reset windows 8 and windows 8 1 http www eightforums com tutorials 2302 reset windows 8 a html when you reset your pc , the drive will be completely reset , and all your apps and files will be removed from it windows 8 will be reinstalled , and you 'll need to change any settings and reinstall any apps that you want to get back after resetting if you know if any files that you do n't want to lose , then you should back those files up before starting the reset cheers __eou__

i am creating a word file to upload to amazon kdp paperback i am running into an enormous amount of difficulties with the page numbering almost all the page numbers are displaying on every other page i do n't know if this is helpful , but i also seem to have created 4 different headers and footers i do n't have any idea how this happened could this be affecting my page numbering problems \? thank you __eou__

if you have the different odd evenpages box checked in the options section of the header and footer toosl design tab of the ribbon , you will need to insert the page numbering field \( s \) into both the odd and even page header or footer note the each section of a document can have up to three different headers and footers if the different first page box is checked first page even page odd page or , without the different odd even pages box checked first page primary header \( appears on all pages except the first page of a section \) without the different first page and different odd even pages boxes checked , you only get the one primary headerfooter that will appear on all pages of a section in a document with mutliple sections , all of the possible header and footers can be different from one section to the next , though you can have each of them the same as the corresponding header or footer in the previous section by clicking on the link to previous button in the navigation section of the header and footer tools design tab __eou__

without any details it 's hard to tell from a screen shot , but my guess is that the image was inserted scaled to fit the slide size at the time the slide size then was changed to a3 , in which case there was a prompt about scaling the image yes was selected the program did exactly what it was supposed to do the reason for the straps is that the original slide size a3 have different aspect ratios the result is that the image was scaled but was scaled proportionately in order to avoid distortion that 's why it spans the width but not the height of the slide in these examples the slide on the left illustrates the image scaled to fit the default widescreen size , the slide on the right is the same slide after changing to a3 iow , changing the slide size after adding content is like having a custom tailored suit made , then gaining losing 25 pounds growing 3 inches taller the tailor can alter the waist but ca n't lengthen the trousers or the jacket , so it is n't the tailor 's fault that the suit no longer fits \) __eou__

what you are describing is not normal behavior in word , obviously if the crashes occur with a particular document , that would point to a corrupt \( that is , damaged \) document copying everything , except for the final paragraph mark , into a new document is often effective as a cure \( to show hide paragraph marks , , as well as other nonprinting marks , you can click the icon on the home tab \) you may have to do some reformatting afterwards , but if you have used styles consistently , that can be done quickly for more on document corruption , see https support microsoft com en us help 918429 how to troubleshoot damaged documents in word trying a different angle , see if word behaves in safe mode \( see https support office com en us article repair an office application 7821d4b6 7c1d 4205 aa0e a6b40c5bb88b \) safe mode makes use of factory default settings and it also disables any macros \( including possibly malicious code added to the normal template \) see https support microsoft com en us help 921541 how to troubleshoot problems that occur when you start or use word __eou__

unfortunately , once you 've seen this error message , it means that powerpoint has corrupted the file there 's no \( currently known \) way to retrieve the lost pictures , other than reverting to a previously saved version of the file , if you have one if you decide to reconstruct the file in ppt 2016 , there are a few steps you can take to avoid or possibly eliminate the possibility of this happening again first make sure your copy of ppt has all available updates next when working on the file , always open from save to a copy of the file on your local hard drive never open from save to files on removable storage \( thumb drives , etc \) copy the file from removable storage to your hard drive , open it from there , save it , then move it back to removable storage if need be on the hard drive , do n't store the file in a location that 's automatically backed up synched or temporarily turn off the auto backup synching while you 're working on the file regularly save the file to a new name to give yourself a trail of saved files in good condition to go back to in case the one you 're working on gets whacked myfile 001 myfile 002 and so on __eou__

hi , welcome to microsoft community i understand that you wanted to disable ip based search results from bing basically this is a backend based configuration just like other websites and search engines however you may override it from your end by properly selecting your appropriate market selecting markets would give you different results based on local cultural norms and sensibilities , restrictions and laws of that particular country for example , indexed results when us market is selected would be different from the results other countries or markets are selected like china or the middle east if the browser does not accept your market selection , then you may need to allow cookies to remember your configuration allowing cookies in ie 1 open internet explorer 2 click tools from the menu bar 3 choose internet options from the dropdown menu 4 click the privacy tab 5 hit the advanced button 6 make sure that the following options are checked a override automatic cookie handling b accept under first party cookies c accept under third party cookies d always allow session cookies 7 click ok to close the advanced privacy settings window select the apply then ok buttons to close the internet options window i hope i have clear things out keep using microsoft community forums for your questions around bing cheers ! __eou__

thank you for your reply i deleted the app data and started installation again , and chose 'deny' in the part which asked to access my contacts as you suggested , this fixed the problem of having 100 's of entries and duplicates in my skype contacts list however , i should stress to others reading this thread that the app does n't use the word 'sync' during set up it is just the normal 'allow skype to access your contacts' permission usually you would grant apps this permission during install , and then things like syncing and managing contacts would have options in the app itself in the privacy settings , the app does have the option 'sync your address book' , which is enabled by default \( hence my problem \) but if you subsequently disable it \( after allowing the app to access your address book \) it does not remove the entries added already this app currently has no other options to manage your contacts __eou__

you do sync to healthvault you could share info through healthvault consider carefully which people should be allowed to see the information what options do i have for sharing health information \? there are several ways in healthvault to share health information give another healthvault user online access to part or all of a healthvault record you can give people who have healthvault accounts access to some or all of the information in a healthvault record you can specify either read only access or permission to modify the record you can also specify which types of health information to share and not share learn how to share a record create an emergency profile an emergency profile contains key medical information that others can view in an emergency you can print wallet cards or page sized sheets containing your emergency profile information you can also create access codes that give online access to your emergency profile , which might be more up to date than a printout learn more about creating an emergency profile print information from your record and show the printout to your doctor or other person learn more about printing health information use encrypted messaging to protect the privacy of medical related email with your doctors , use the message center app \( us accounts only \) this app uses encryption to reduce the chance of unauthorized access to sensitive health information that you exchange with your doctors learn more about message center how do i give access to a healthvault record to another trusted person \? to share your health record with someone you trust sign in to healthvault on the left side of the page , click sharing click share health information with someone you trust complete the form , then click send invitation a few things to note you choose the level of access you allow you can let someone view and use but not change information , view and change information , or act as a custodian of the record people you share with can authorize apps to have the same kind of access they do for example , someone who can only view information can allow an app to view the information , but not to change it you also decide what types of information you want to share you can select specific information types , or you can share everything in your record if you give access only to selected items , you ll need to send a new sharing invitation if you later decide to share additional information types to provide an extra level of security for the invitation , set a passcode do n't forget to tell the recipient the passcode ! you can set a new one if you resend the invitation you can set an expiration date on the recipient 's access in addition , healthvault sets an expiration date on the invitation if the invitation is not accepted within the expiration period , you will need to resend it to accept the invitation , the person you invite to access the record must have a healthvault account if they do not have one , they will be invited to sign up for healthvault note for performance reasons , windows phone allows only one location tracking app to remain active at any given time if you need to use an app that requires access to your location while the bing health fitness app is tracking your workout \( even a non fitness app , such as facebook or bing search \) , we recommend that you launch the bing health fitness app again after you 're done so the app remains active and continues to track your workout https account healthvault com help en us default htm hope this helps __eou__

hello julie , welcome to skype community ! i do understand the inconvenience you have faced your conversation history is saved on your computer 's hard drive for a specific period of time if you wish to delete all skype chat history , please go through below steps \( applicable using skype for windows desktop \) 1 in the menu bar , select skype and then select privacy 2 under keep history for , choose clear history 3 a new pop up window will appear delete history \? this will delete all traces of previous conversations including instant messages , sms , calls , voice messages and file transfers \( this will also all open conversations \) 4 click on delete then save hope this helps , let me know if you need further assistance thank you ! __eou__

deleting conversation history on one device does not delete the history from any other devices each of the devices skype is installed on has it 's own local history storage and the history must be deleted locally on this particular device skype installation also , note that in microsoft skype for windows 10 \( skype uwp \) application , there is no in build option to remove the locally saved conversation history if you want to delete the entire conversation history on skype uwp , then you will have manually to delete the main db file where the history is saved location of the main db database file used by skype uwp is localappdata packagesmicrosoft skypeapp kzf8qxf38zg5clocalstate skype name main db __eou__

i need write an excel formula to calculate a charge rate based on the following criteria note that cwt is equal to the total pounds divided by 100 0 1710 lbs 7 cwt 1711 3330 lbs 6 cwt 3331 and greater 5 cwt example 1500 lbs would be 1500 100 7 105 the only variable tracked on the spreadsheet is the total pounds therefore , all other variables must be contained in the formula i have tried to create a nested if formula but ca n't seem to get the syntax right any assistance would be greatly appreciated __eou__

huh , my nested if would be \( assuming number of pounds is in cell a1 \) if \( a1 1711 , a1 7 , if \( a1 3331 , a1 6 , a1 5 \) \) note that since the second if is only called if a1 1711 you do n't need to make sure it is over 1710 you could also use an ifs ifs \( a1 1711 , a1 7 , a1 3331 , a1 6 , a1 3330 , a1 5 \) \( ifs is a special form of if designed for several if statements to slightly reduce the amount of nesting , if will check each if in turn and return that result if true , otherwise it will go to the next if \) __eou__

thank you for your response i think where i am getting tripped up is the second condition is a between so that if the pounds are between 1711 and 3330 then the amount charged per cwt is 6 how would i account for the two conditions in the second nested if statement \? __eou__

the trick is to not think of it as between , but as a set of exclusions step 1 , is the number less than 1711 \? if yes , then 7 , else go to step 2 step 2 , is the number less than 3331 \? if yes then 6 , else go to step 3 step 3 , 5 you see , you do n't need to worry about the number being less than 1711 in step 2 because in step 1 you already removed anything less than 1711 from your list , by multiplying it by 7 and ending your if statement i could also write the if statement the following ways if \( a1 3330 , a1 5 , if \( a1 1710 , a1 6 , a1 7 \) \) if \( a1 3330 , a1 5 , if \( a1 1711 , a1 7 , a1 6 \) \) if \( a1 3330 , if \( a1 1711 , a1 6 , a1 7 \) , a1 5 \) the latter was an attempt to check for your between first but if statements are not designed to worry about between , you use two ifs for that the trick is to remember that excel follows each if rule in order , so once it has done the first task , any number affected by that if statement is not available to the later if statements so if you have your first question be is a1 3330 then you no longer have to worry about your number being 3330 , because you already dealt with all those customers with your first if __eou__

hi , try this 1 type 0 , 1711 and 3331 in range a2 a4 2 type 7 , 6 and 5 in range b2 b4 3 type 1500 in cell a6 4 in cell b6 , enter this formula vlookup \( a6 , a 2 b 4 , 2 , 1 \) a6 100 hope this helps __eou__

hi , this could be due to any corruption in system files or any third party software conflict try the steps below and check step 1 start the computer in safe mode and check the behavior safe mode is a troubleshooting option for windows that starts your computer in a limited state only the basic files and drivers necessary to run windows are started the words safe mode appear in the corners of your monitor to identify which windows mode you 're using a when you hit the power button , hold down the shift key when clicking the restart button b the next screen will present you with three options click troubleshoot c next , hit advanced options followed by windows startup settings from the next screen d your pc will now be rebooted to enable the advanced parameters , which include safe mode as well step 2 if the issue does not persist in safe mode , place the computer in clean boot state to avoid any third party software conflict to help troubleshoot error messages and other issues , you can start windows by using a minimal set of drivers and startup programs this kind of startup is known as a clean boot a clean boot helps eliminate software conflicts placing your system in clean boot state helps in identifying if any third party applications or startup items are causing the issue you need to follow the steps from the article mentioned below to perform a clean boot how to perform a clean boot in windows note refer how to reset the computer to start normally after clean boot troubleshooting to reset the computer to start as normal after troubleshooting step 3 run the system file checker tool system file checker is a utility in windows that allows users to scan for corruptions in windows system files and restore corrupted files press windows key x and click command prompt \( admin \) type the following command and press enter sfc scannow note do not close this command prompt window until the verification is 100 complete the scan results will be shown after this process is finished hope this information is helpful please feel free to reply in case you face any other issues with windows in future __eou__

hi , thank you for posting your query in microsoft community yes , bing allows direct linking and you link directly to the sales page from the bing ad here are the steps to start a direct linking campaign on bing 1 setup your first campaign first , open a bing or microsoft account then you can create your first campaign click on the campaigns tab and select create campaign then , name your campaign and set up the budget 2 create your ad next , you need to actually write your ad make sure you research your product well and pick the most appropriate keywords for your target market when you re done , enter the ad title , ad text , the display url and the destination url here s the difference between display url and destination url \? the display url is where you can add your main keyword to increase the click through rate and improve your results remember , although the display and destination url are used for different purpose , the domain name of the display url and destination url should always be the same if you re using more than one word in the display url , you can separate those either by an underscore or by hyphens 3 add your affiliate link now it s time to add your affiliate link in the destination url box however , you should never run affiliate campaigns without using some sort of tracking that can be used to track your results hope this information is helpful please feel free to reply in case you face any other issues with windows in future __eou__

i wish to save a backup copy of xl files \( to the same folder on c drive as the base file \) when i do an update thereto and save the file i am not referring to autosave __eou__

when you say not referring to autosave i am not sure if you mean the auto recover or autobackup there is a description of autobackup at the following link \( go down towards the end of the page under heading autobackup \) https www online tech tips com ms office tips excel autorecover and automatic backup however , the above method overwrites the previous backups and if this is not what you require and you want to keep several versions of backups then you will need to change the document to a macro enabled workbook and use the save event vba code below to install the vba event code now when the workbook is saved , if changes have been made since opening , then a backup file will be created in the same folder as the master if no changes then the file will save as normal but no backup will be created the backup file name is in the format filename yyyy mm dd hh mm ss xlsm the reverse date with year first is used so the file names can be sorted all 2 digit months , days , hours , minutes and seconds are used because sorting is based on text and this ensures that sorting occurs correctly if the user selects save as then the backup code is not implemented and allows the user to create a file name of choice ie the user might select a backup version and the use save as to replace the master copy feel free to get back to me if any problems copy all of the code below into the vba editor private sub workbook beforesave \( byval saveasui as boolean , cancel as boolean \) dim strbackupname as string 'if user selects save as then the code for backup does not run so that user 'can select a backup and then save to whatever name is required if saveasui false then 'only run backup code if change made otherwise save simply saves without backup if activeworkbook saved false then on error goto reenableevents application enableevents false 'suppress recursive calls to save event thisworkbook save 'save normally 'create backup filename using date and time 'colons invalid in file name and hense colons replaced with spaces in time portion strbackupname left \( thisworkbook fullname , instrrev \( thisworkbook fullname , xlsm \) 1 \) format \( now , yyyy mm dd hh mm ss \) xlsm thisworkbook savecopyas filename strbackupname end if end if reenableevents if err number 0 then msgbox error occurred in thisworkbook module , private sub workbook beforesave end if application enableevents true end sub __eou__

hi , thank you for contacting microsoft community have you installed any other third party cd dvd ripping program , by chance \? have you installed any third party codec pack \? did you make any software changes prior to the issue \? do you receive any error code along with the error message \? follow the methods listed below to fix the issue method 1 if you have any third party cd ripping software or any codec pack installed on your computer , i d recommend you to uninstall the same and try ripping using windows media player and check if that fixes the issue method 2 disable and enable windows media player \( wmp \) using the turn windows features on or off feature see turn windows features on or off note windows media player would be listed under media features uncheck windows media player and restart the computer to disable wmp re check the same and restart to enable wmp method 3 perform a system file checker \( sfc \) scan sfc tool scans system files and replaces incorrect versions of the system files by using the correct versions see https support microsoft com en us kb 929833 hope this helps regards , anushascott __eou__

when a page is still live on the web , the bing crawler \( bingbot \) will revisit it in regular intervals to update the content in our index and store a copy in the bing cache however , changes can take time to be reflected in the index and the cached page you can notify bing about outdated cache by providing the url and a piece of text from the outdated cached page that is no longer present on the page that is live on the web steps to submit an outdated cache removal request you can submit an outdated cache removal request for a page that is live on the web \( http status code 200 \) and for which we still have old and outdated content in our cache by doing the following __eou__

3 4 2015 andrea , i installed the latest win8 x64 driver for my printer that helped , but not completely i suspected that the problem was with the website and i was right in ie11 the f12 tools have evolved quite nicely the various help pages insist that the developer test early and often that apparently not done when the print css was developed i was surprised to find that ie7 was the default emulation even changing the emulation to ie8 eliminated the issue with the pagination i looked at the source and found this in the head meta http equiv x ua compatible content ie 7 that restricts internet explorer to the document modes of ie7 now , to put it into perspective , in 2010 ms issued a warning that support for ie6 and 7 was ending most larger sites phased out support for ie7 several years ago since the meta tag above is only followed by ie , it makes sense why firefox printed correctly i did some elementary troubleshooting that the site developers should have done hopefully , by pointing to a line of code , it can be fixed quickly __eou__

i downloaded recipe tracker recipe template and i love it but i discovered an issue i do not know how to resolve every time i add a new page \( by copying one of the empty recipe pages \) , nothing happens to the table of contents the recipe , category , hyperlink to page none of that is there for my new recipes my table of contents only updates for information on the pages that came with the template i downloaded obviously i have more than 5 recipes ! how can i connect all of my pages to the table of contents like the original pages are \? __eou__

hello , the table of contents is not designed to update automatically you need to create a new recipe entry manually i find that these steps work 1 copy an empty recipe tab 2 rename the recipe tab , for example call it bangers and mash put the same name into cell e3 and select a category in cell g3 3 go to the recipe contents tab and select the cell of column b in the next empty row below the table that means if the last recipe is listed in row 9 , click cell b9 edit typo click cell b10 , not b9 4 hold down the ctrl key and press d this will copy the formula from the cell above \( ctrl d is the keyboard shortcut for copy down \) 5 with cell b10 selected , hit the f2 key to edit the formula in the downloaded workbook , cell b9 has this formula 'empty recipe 5' ! recipename change it to 'bangers and mash' ! recipename now you can see the category filled in automatically if you fill in the other sections on the bangers and mash sheet , the contents will update automatically for that sheet __eou__
thank you so much ! ! ! it worked like a charm ! it seems so simple now but i was clueless you made my day d __eou__

hi , this is too easy and i'm hear to show you how ! in the recipe name field in the recipe content tab , ensure the title of the recipe appears with no markings if the recipe is for galactical summer squash , then this should say exactly that and only that in the formula bar when you click on the recipe name in the content tab now , click on the corresponding category cell for this recipe , tip this is in column h there should be a small grey triangle in the upper left corner of the cell when you click on the cell a small yellow diamond box appears \( has an exclamation point on it \( ! \) hover over this box and a list of options appears choose the second one that says to recalculate the box it wo n't say exactly that but it 's the only option with the word recalculate on it now click click to view and all should be fine so it 's 1 ensure recipe name on the recipe content sheet says the correct name with no special characters 2 go to category box \( column h \) for the particular recipe on the recipe content sheet and hover over the yellow diamond box until a list of options appears 3 choose recalculate 4 test by selecting click to view voila ! __eou__

hi stephen , were there any changes made on the computer prior to the issue \? the common two causes of this issue can be a microsoft account has not been verified yet on your computer b date and time in your computer is set wrongly method 1 the store app uses https instead of http which is used by other apps , so in order for the ssl handshake to proceed , the clock on the client and server needs to be correct follow the steps below to check if the date and time are set correctly a \) in the start screen type date and time , and click on date and time settings b \) check if the date and time is set correctly method 2 follow the steps below to finish 2 step verification process \( important \) a close the store app completely \( swipe down from the top \) b open the charms bar , click on settings and then on change pc settings c click on accounts , it will show your microsoft account there d see if there is a verify link below your account if so , click on it and go through the 2 step verification process e once done try starting the store and check if you are able to visit windows store method 3 you may try to reset the windows store cache let us know the results if you have any further issues on the computer , please post your question regarding windows and we will be happy to help you __eou__

hi kings my name is ron this appears to be an error code associated with upgrades , more than updates there are several possible fixes mentioned 1 disable all antimalware and firewalls , especially 3rd part ones make sure they are turned back on after the update is done try running the update if that did n't work try 2 restart all windows services associated with windows update in start menu search for cmd right click on it and select run as administrator in the command prompt window enter the following commands one at a time net stop bits net stop wuauserv net stop appidsvc net stop cryptsvc enter the following commands to rename the update install folders ren systemroot softwaredistribution softwaredistribution bak ren systemroot system32catroot2 catroot2 bak \( wait a while after the fix is complete and you are sure it is working , then come back and delete these folders , which at that point are just wasting space \) restart the update services net start bits net start wuauserv net start appidsvc net start cryptsvc now try update as well , this is a voodoo fix try switching to a wired connection for the update although i have not seen suggestions this is an issue with this code , i make this suggestion because i do know for sure that office 365 is very fussy about it 's internet connection during updates good luck when you finally find a fix , let us know what it was if you find a reply has fixed your problem please click on the accept this answer blue hyperlink button please grade your satisfaction with our replies by clicking on one of the green yellow red option buttons your grading our answers helps improve our service __eou__

hi ! i have an excel spreadsheet that i want to use to calculate sum time i have four columns \( also a screenshot is posted below ! \) 1 time start 2 time end 3 total day hours 4 total night hours so what i do is that i put a time in time start column and a time in time end column so in the day column , if i do time end time start \( using cell references obviously \) , i succuessfully get my total hours minutes however , my problem is that all of that time goes inside the day column so how can i get excel to put any hours time after 7pm and until 5am to be inside the night column \? here is an image of my spreadsheet as you can see , i was testing it , it works though , but it cares for all time as day \( obviously as i put it in day , but i would like to divide this ! \) so for example , say if i put start time as 3 00pm and end time as 9 00pm what i would like to happen is that , any time before 6pm is in day so i would want the sum to be 3 hours in day column and then the remaining 3 hours in night \( as any hours after 6pm is declared as night \) or if there is no time before 6pm , it all should simply be in night vice versa i'm quite a newbie so , i 'd like some help ! thanks __eou__

add one more column where you can enter the time you consider to be end of day \( let us say 6pm as per your example above \) if this is in col e then in day column enter e2 a2 and in night column enter b2 e2 this assumes that end time is after day end if not then you can add if around the formula like this if \( e2 b2 , e2 a2 , b2 a2 \) for day and if \( b2 e2 , b2 e2 , 0 \) you may have to fix the conditions but you get the idea __eou__

how can i get excel to put any hours time after 7pm and until 5am to be inside the night column \? day c2 max \( min \( time \( 19 , 0 , 0 \) , b2 \) max \( time \( 5 , 0 , 0 \) , a2 \) , 0 \) night d2 max \( \( b2 a2 \) c2 , 0 \) this assumes that the start time will always be less than the end time and the elapsed time will be less than 24 hours you have described to separate situations in your description if you wanted to use 6 pm rather than 7 pm then just change time \( 19 , 0 , 0 \) to time \( 18 , 0 , 0 \) regards , jamie ogilvy __eou__

hi ! i solved the issue by somehow using tom 's formula however that failed at points when i had no daytime or when sometimes i had only night time so i got an average idea and made a working if statement formula along with another column with a set night time cut out i 'll post it below incase someone else ever needs something similar formula for day if \( l3 o 3 , if \( k3 o 3 , 0 , o 3 k3 \) , l3 k3 \) formula for night if \( l3 o 3 , if \( k3 o 3 , l3 k3 , l3 o 3 \) , 0 \) the second if statement inside the main if statement was added as when my time start was after 6pm , the formula returned negative values as it summed from 6pm an integer greater than 6 thus negative values the second if prevents that ! my new setup i have resolved this issue , this discussion may be closed ! thank you to all who helped __eou__
