hello , the version of word that i am using is word 2013 i would really appreciate any help offered in putting a header in my word document this problem has been driving me spare because all i want to do is place a header on the first page only i enter the header i want on the first page and it immediately appears on every page thereafter then when i click the box which says different first page it simply deletes it from the first page but keeps it for every other page the exact opposite of what i want i 've then tried putting the heading i wanted back on the first page again and gone to the 2nd page before clicking different first page at first i thought i had cracked it because it vanished from the 2nd page and remained on the 1st , but then to my dismay i discovered that it was still there on every other page to me this is totally balmy ! surely there has to be a way of placing a header on the 1st page only if someone is able to point out to me why it 's me that is stupid and not the software then i will be most grateful __eou__

this is controlled by sections if you put a section break at the end of the first page , you can then change the header with the second section also , if you use the different first page and it does what you describe , cut from the main header and paste into the first page header one last point , if you only want it to appear on the first page , why use a header at all \? why not just put it on the top of the text \? __eou__

see the different first page setting in a one page document displays the first page header and hides the main header you can cut from the header you created , click on different first page , and paste there if you want do not create a different section to get different headers see also styleref field before you even think about doing this __eou__

formula in cell a3 sum \( offset \( d7 , , , match \( a1 , a7 a196 , 0 \) \) \) this returns the sum of column d starting from cell d7 till the value of a1 \( ie 9 \) is found in column a \( starting a7 downwards \) in case your query has been correctly understood regards , elizabeth tandon www globaliconnect com __eou__

the code sets the print area in the command set r1 ws range \( a1 i30 , a31 f64 , a65 f88 , a89 h135 , a136 g167 , a168 j202 , a203 i239 , a240 g264 \) in the code i posted and in the command vrng array \( \( a1 i30 , a31 f64 , a65 f88 , a89 h 135 , a136 g167 , a168 j202 , a203 i239 , a240 g264 \) on the code tasosk posted \( and there is an extra left paren which you have correctly removed \) these will be the pages if the zoom settings are set to fit that area on a single page then each of the codes has the command printarea where it passes the address of the range for the specific area being printed you should remove all manual pagebreaks because scaling does not override pagebreaks like fit to page does to summarize no manual page breaks no printareas defined put percent scaling into the arrays to correspond to the range areas determined by doing it manually first \( but if you ca n't see the page data doing it manually , then using the same scaling with the code will be no better regards , trevor ogilvy __eou__

helpful link , thanks unfortunately i cannot give you the whole picture , or even anything like the whole picture , but some things to look out for a the sharepoint data types do not map all that well onto the word content control types \( there are a lot more of the former , for one thing \) b some of the mapping , in particular the presentation choices , used to be better when the old document information panel \( dip \) was available , in the sense that the display in the dip conformed better to the data type in sharepoint but i do not think for example you can present a multiple choice as a set of radio buttons in word c as far as i know , the current version of word online lets you see content controls \( and even the content control name tags \) but does not let you edit their contents i think you have to use an office \( javascript \) add in to do that however , even that may depend on whether you are using the public version of word online or one hosted by a private sharepoint site , although i assume that the latter version always catches up to the former d when you edit in desktop word , what word actually looks at to try to validate the data in a content control is the xml schema that is generated by sharepoint and inserted along with the server metadata but the user does not necessarily get to see that they have invalid data until they click outside the control or try to save but some of the constraints that you might think would be applied are not for example , if you specify a multiline type in sharepoint , you can specify a maximum line count , and afaik you do not get to specify a character count limit but when you enter a new line in a plain text content control in word , what word inserts is a hard line return , and the resulting lines do not appear to count as lines as far as sharepoint is concerned further , word seems to impose a 255 character maximum whatever sharepoint allows e because the word checkbox content control type was not one of the original types , sharepoint does not use it \( although i think perhaps it should , now \) so the obvious user interface element for yes no type values is not used instead , you get a dropdown that presents true and false choices , and theya re literally those choices because that 's what gets sent in the xml f as a general rule , indexed types are probably not going to work as you might like e g a lookup just presents a number , not the text actually referenced by the lookup and i do n't think stuff such as person group or managed metadata types will work properly edit at least some of the stuff that you used to be able to do in the dip you can now do in backstage in the property editing area in fact some of it is better in thte sense that you do get to see lookups etc from sharepoint __eou__

hi meg , please check the following methods and see if there is any improvement method 1 check the hard disc name make sure that your hard disc has a name the name cannot be all numbers but can contain numbers the name must start with a letter it must not contain any special characters , such as periods , commas , semi colons , quotation marks , and so on method 2 save to a different location e g the desktop method 3 empty the autorecovery folder \( make sure you have quit all office applications \) 1 paste defaults write com apple finder appleshowallfiles yes in terminal \( finder applications utilities terminal \) , and then press return to show hidden files 2 hold the option alt key , right click on the finder icon in the dock and click relaunch 3 go to library containers com microsoft word data library preferences autorecovery to select all the files and copy them to a new desktop folder 4 paste defaults write com apple finder appleshowallfiles no in terminal \( finder applications utilities terminal \) , and then press return to hide hidden files again method 4 remove word preferences 1 quit all office applications 2 open finder , click go in the top menu bar go to folder and go to library group containers ubf8t346g9 office user content templates , move normal dotm to desktop 3 go to library preferences , locate the files com microsoft word plist and com microsoft office plist , move them to the desktop \( word will rebuild them \) 4 restart word method 5 press and hold the shift key to start or restart your mac in safe mode to determine whether other background applications and add ins are interfering with word if the issue still occurs , please provide the following information 1 can you open word application \? if yes , when you create a new document , does the issue occur \? does the issue occur to all the existing documents \? what are their common features \( file format e g doc , the application version that created the documents and so on \) \? 2 what actions have you performed before the issue occurred for the first time \? for example , a system update and a software installation does the issue occur right after the upgrade \? 3 detailed steps and related screenshots \( error messages \) about how you encounter the issue do you double click to open documents \? 4 your mac os version \( e g 10 12 4 \) and word version for mac os version , from the apple menu , choose about this mac the version number appears beneath macos or os x for your word version , choose word in the top menu bar about word and please capture a screenshot of the window in addition , for the powerpoint issue , we suggest posting a new thread so we can handle them separately thanks , tinajessica __eou__

hello , i think windows defender does a decent job in protecting you computer from the most prevalent and widespread threats combined with windows firewall , you also get a protection from online unauthorized access to you computer and lan protection from local networks attacks \( like in open wifi zones \) however , windows defender scores low in many av tests given that these tests really use very sophisticated malware that are zero day malware \( windows defender scores very low in this category \) normal users do not typically encounter those creepy malware also , windows defender does not provide strong protection against ongoing exploits \( some other security products can detect exploit activity on vulnerable apps and prevent it \) , so make sure you keep all you software updated , especially windows , as microsoft continuously provide new updates to secure you system now , you are the one to decide if you need an additional security software or not i just can give you some points to consider while deciding 1 are you a cautious user \? this mean , for example , do you easily recognize suspicious websites or downloads or not or can you spot signs of infection \? 2 how often do you shop online using your banking information \? 3 do you have very important data in your computer \( this may sound silly \) \) \? 4 do you install infamous software often \? 5 do you mind running malwarebytes scans weekly \? 6 etc just understand that if you want premium protection , windows defender is far from being the best product , however , it provides decent protection against the most common threats advanced security products often offer advanced cloud protection , very impressive detection of zero day malware \( very recent unknown threats \) , automatic prevention from exploits , protection from fishing websites \( higher than the smart screen filter \) you choose , i think you are the only one to know if you need high protection or only a basic one i used windows defender in windows 8 windows 8 1 for quite some time and it did a great job protecting my system until once i realized i had a rootkit that it did not detect i am now using another security suit i hope this helps __eou__

hi , thank you for contacting microsoft community i understand your concern and would like to inform you that to unlock your drive , you will need either the bitlocker password or the bitlocker recovery key while enabling bitlocker , you get the option to create a password key and a recovery file if you had saved the recovery file somewhere , you can still decrypt but i am really sorry to say that if you do not remember any of these , then we ll be not be able to help you further due to security reasons you may go through the following microsoft article to get more information http windows microsoft com en us windows 8 unlock bitlocker protected drive http windows microsoft com en us windows 8 bitlocker drive encryption see also https technet microsoft com en us library hh831507 aspx bkmk bltgunlock write to us if you need assistance with windows in future we ll be glad to help __eou__

attempt to find the bitlocker recovery key if you printed it out , look through your personal paperwork if you saved it on a computer or another drive , do a search for files with bitlocker in the name if you think you might have written the password down then you can look for that too if you are unable to find the recovery key then you have two remaining options one is to try and crack the bitlocker password if you did things properly this wo n't work the whole point of bitlocker is it ca n't be cracked but if you used a weak password it might it 's not a topic i know about in detail and it probably should n't be discussed on microsoft answers anyway the second is to run a data recovery tool on any other computers or drives you have , and hope that you or your programs saved copies of the files on there in the past photorec is my usual choice , http www cgsecurity org wiki photorec to use it you will need another external drive with lots of free space this might be your best chance of getting some of your files back , __eou__

hello brad jr , welcome to skype community ! i know how important this is for you i 'd be glad to assist you on this what is the os version and skype version installed on your device \? os version press windows key r key at the same time , type winver , then hit ok skype version in the menu bar , click on help about skype to isolate the issue , please check below tips 1 make sure that you and the person you 're calling installed the latest version of skype on both devices download the latest version of skype 2 make sure that both devices meet the specific system requirements need to run skype 3 check the bandwidth skype needs for the mean time , please go through below steps 1 make sure that skype is no longer running right click on the skype icon quit skype 2 on your keyboard , press the windows key r key then , the run windows will appear 3 on the run window , type in appdata skype and hit enter 4 look for a file named shared or shared xml and delete it 5 open the folder that has your skype name 6 locate for a file config or config xml and delete it 7 open control panel and look for internet options 8 go to the advanced tab and select reset 9 put a check mark under delete personal settings , hit ok and then enter 10 close it when prompted 11 restart skype troubleshooting problems with skype calls hope this helps kindly share to us the results thank you ! __eou__

hi , event logs are special files that record significant events on your computer , such as when a user logs on to the computer or when a program encounters an error whenever these types of events occur , windows records the event in an event log that you can read by using event viewer advanced users might find the details in event logs helpful when troubleshooting problems with windows and other programs event viewer tracks information in several different logs windows logs include applications and services logs vary they include separate logs about the programs that run on your computer , as well as more detailed logs that pertain to specific windows services hope this information is helpful open event viewer by right clicking the start button , clicking control panel , clicking administrative tools , and then double clicking event viewer if you 're prompted for an administrator password or confirmation , type the password or provide confirmation click an event log in the left pane double click an event to view the details of the event __eou__

hi i am trying to format an excel so that when i export reports it 'll automatically turn the percentages into whole numbers for example , when i try to change 100 into a number , it automatically changes it to 1 , not 100 the process i am currently using is very tedious , so i am hoping there is a simple solution __eou__

put 100 in a cell select that cell and do a copy select all of the cells with the percentages and do a paste special and select values , formats and multiply then click ok this should convert your percentages to numbers now if you had a percentage that was 33 and it actually contained 33333333 then this would not make that a whole number however , you could format the cell to not show any decimal places after you multiplied by 100 you might want to test this process on a copy of your workbook until you are satisfied it does what you need regards , __eou__

i put 100 in a cell and copied it but its unclear where i should put that copied 100 after that i selected all of my percentages and found the paste special values , but i'm confused about what the formats and multiply refer to and where i can find those for your example with the 33 , this is one of my big issues what i have been doing is multiplying all of my s by 100 in another column , then copying those values and pasting them as numbers i feel like what you explained is basically the same thing \? i was hoping there may be an easier way either way thank you for your help ! __eou__

when you copy the 100 , then you select the destination cell and do the paste special in the dialog , you select three buttons values , formats multiply \( the multiply is in the operation section \) this will multiply the cells in place by 100 and it will reformat the cell so you do n't get was 33 after 3300 \( by not pasting formats \) but instead will get 33 of course this assumes that you formatted the cell with the original 100 with the format that you want to see after the paste yes it is the same thing as you do with your formula , but you do n't have to created the formulas , and copy and paste all the cells , then remove the formulas it can be used on non contiguous ranges and so forth it is a technique i use all the time with little thought or effort it takes seconds to perform of course you could use a macro but beyond that , i ca n't think of a built in method that is easier perhaps someone else will have a better idea regards , eric ogilvy __eou__
ohhhh okay ! great this makes a lot more sense sorry for the confusion on my part thanks for the follow up , i think this will make the process a lot smoother ! __eou__

since the drive is apparently full you need to do some emergency cleanup windows has been traditionally very cranky when it is low on drive space and it 's definition of low has been based on percentage free , rather than absolute values which now leads to the ludicrous situation where windows starts complaining about low drive space even with 10 's or hundreds of gb , \( yes gb \) of free space start by typing diskclean in the start menu this will locate the built in hard drive cleanup tool this will help you delete unneeded files here are a couple of articles on using the tool http www techrepublic com article how to clean up system files with the windows 10 disk cleanup tool https www howtogeek com 256594 how to enable hidden options in windows disk cleanup tool __eou__

hello , i have found windows 10 on my new laptop \( an ultra thin hp x360 13 3 \) rather confusing i understand there 's a way to get back to the days of windows 7 backup , whereby the windows image is also created onto the backup medium so it can be used in the future for recovery if need be but i am also told \( and gather from the many confusing blogs out there \) , that windows 10 is just to keep file history i e , backup and maintain versions of a file the windows os image itself does n't seem to be covered by the windows 10 file history backup one suggestion i got was to use macrium reflect \( free version \) to keep the windows 10 image for recovery purposes and then separately , use windows 10 file history backup for my own privately created files and folders this sounds interesting but implies \( i think \) keeping two distinct and separate backups one for windows os image and one for my important files any advice , tips , or suggestions on a proper approach would be highly appreciated thank you in advance __eou__

yes i recommend the 2 separate backups approach a full image copy backup , either using the win 7 backup or macrium this is to primarily capture your os , but it can also capture your personal data files personally i prefer macrium so that i can create a bootable usb dvd disk to run the restore from , just in case of a worst case problem yes , file history is only intended for your personal data files it requires an external drive , like a sd card or usb drive file history is 'automatic' and constant , while win7 macrium is a long interval manual process unfortunately for me file history is not working for some reason is it not recognizing the option for it to automatically delete files when space is needed , so it keeps whining about no space on my backup drive there is a 3rd option that is to use onedrive it will automatically backup your defined folders to the cloud that is if you do n't mind sharing your personal files with the cloud __eou__

i personally use system image which is still available in windows 10 learn how to create a system image in the following article http answers microsoft com en us windows wiki windows 10 win upgrade how to create a system image in windows 10 84fa6683 e3ac 4e93 9139 368af9267869 instructions how to restore the image if needed http answers microsoft com en us windows wiki windows 10 update how to restore a windows 10 system image to an e20992ca 5641 4f7c bb09 3895d0732162 microsoft is planning to deprecate both system image and file history in the future macrium reflect and easeus todo backup , both available in free versions are two options i recommend check out the following article how to use both https www groovypost com howto create windows 10 system image best free alternatives __eou__

hi , i deleted my skype account by mistake i thought i was uninstalling it from my old pc and it turns out i deleted my account how do i reactivate it \? also i am living in a different country now from when i had signed up so i cant verify the country lived in when i set it up over 7 years ago and the information i used to create the account 7 years ago was very limited so there is n't much information i can verify also i hardly use the email i had set up skype from and i always signed in with my skype name i really need to reactivate my account asap the family members i contact are elderly and i cant get their information , everything was set up with my account automatically please help ! thanks __eou__

hi lisa and welcome to the skype community ! account closure follows a step by step process if you accidentally closed your account , you can still reactivate it provided that the closure took place not longer than 60 days when an account has been marked for closure , there will be a 60 day waiting period before it gets completely deleted from skype 's database during these period , you can still recover the account by logging in to cancel the closure however , if it 's been longer than 60 days , there is no option to recover it anymore if it has not exceeded the 60 days yet , sign in to your account and the system will cancel the closure everything will be just as you left it and no changes will take effect on your account for additional details , please refer to this support link let us know if you need further assistance , thank you __eou__

hi lisa you have to ensure that the account you logged in to is the account you accidentally processed a deletion for you do not need to do anything else as the cancellation will automatically be cancelled once you sign back in to the account __eou__

hello as a relatively new excel user \( excel for mac v 15 3 \) , i am struggling with what i thought would be a simple problem i have a table with multiple columns , each of which contains a list of selected integers between 1 and 340 these represent case numbers in an audit , with each column containing only those numbers which are positive with respect to the particular criteria defined by that column so the values are never repeated within the same column i want to copy the value in each cell of the column to a new column , but with the row number defined by the value in that column \( only alternate columns a , c , e are filled , leaving b , d , f etc for the returned results \) so , for example , if the first three cells a1 , a2 , a3 in column a contain the values 83 , 41 , 279 , i want the formula to return the values 83 , 41 , 279 into cells b83 , b41 and b279 respectively it does n't matte that the intervening cells will be blank i then want to repeat the exercise for column c into column d , e into f etc if there is a way to do it for the whole spreadsheet at once that would be great , but even if i have to do one column at a time that would be acceptable any ideas appreciated __eou__

hi dave , for if the first three cells a1 , a2 , a3 in column a contain the values 83 , 41 , 279 , i want the formula to return the values 83 , 41 , 279 into cells b83 , b41 and b279 respectively it does n't matte that the intervening cells will be blank , is the screenshot below is what you mean \? if it s not related to your requirement , to know more clearly about your question , please describe more with screenshots thanks , rena paul __eou__
you can use the function row \( \) to return the row number to the cell __eou__

thanks , paul , that is exactly what i mean i need to preserve some aspects of the data aside from the value when it is copied , for example the colour coding , like this \( there are actually dozens of columns of data \) bobmelanie has replied to suggest using row \( \) function i know i probably need to use this , but how exactly \? thanks for your help __eou__

in b1 , ifna \( vlookup \( row \( \) , a a , 1 , false \) , \) copy down to b340 copy b1 to d1 , copy down to d340 , etc vlookup will look for the number of the row in the first column , and if it finds it , will put it in the current cell exactly as it is in the original cell ifna will replace the n a with a \( a blank cell \) if there is no match oh , if your excel is old enough that you do n't have ifna , you can use if \( isna \( vlookup \( row \( \) , a a , 1 , false \) , , vlookup \( row \( \) a a , 1 , false \) but it is clunkier __eou__

hi lisa thank you for your response and input wrt liveweb and win10 creator 's update i spent some time on it tonight and win10 1703 feature update \( creators \) seems to be the culprit in the scenarios i tested here 's some info from my trials i was able to do some further troubleshooting tonight and confirmed that the issue is only experienced after the windows 10 creators 's update i setup two vm 's \( 1 win10pro 1607 and 1 win10education 1607 \) i installed office 2016 pro plus on both vm 's and then liveweb with the respective registry entries modified as needed i then inserted a few liveweb slides and ran the presentation and the pages and files both were displayed on the first time through i then ran windows update on both vm 's and received the needed security patches up to but before the 1703 creator 's feature update i tested again with the presentation and the pages files displayed on the first go around my next update to both vm 's was the creator 's update 1703 feature update once that was loaded and systems rebooted i ran the presentations and both did not display the webpage files with liveweb \( while not resolved as of yet , i appreciate you guiding me to focus on the creator 's update ! i'm happy to have narrowed it down , at least in my mind to the cause and it helps me with a more concise work around for the immediate __eou__

lisa et al just an update after a little more troubleshooting again , i'm not a programmer and my troubleshooting is limited to more of an 'desktop' style this post 's purpose is to sharing information for others more than anything so , i decided to open task manager during the running of a slide with the liveweb control to see if i can see any process that were running with the thought of maybe getting a process explorer app installed and get more granular windows task manager looks like this when hitting the slide with liveweb \( screen shot inserted \) you 'll notice on the third process under microsoft powerpoint \( 32 bit \) \( 3 \) a process that just shows a window icon but does not provide any text to indicate what it is that line and icon do indeed represent the liveweb control this \( as stated in initial post \) confirms the add in is running correct and not erroring or being blocked in taskmanager if you right click that window icon and choose bring to front while on the first pass of viewing that slide the contents display \( so a second visit is not needed \) of course , this cannot be done or would not be effective while running the powerpoint presentation in my layman 's terms , i believe maybe the embedded control is loosing top window focus and therefore is not seen on the first visit to the slide i just do n't understand why if you go back \( or forward \) and then revisit the slide a 2nd time it then puts that window in the front workaround in place again , just sharing information that i am seeing my work around has been to create a custom slide show with only the slides that have the embedded control and let them cycle through once before the 'live' presentation begins i then stop the custom show \( without exiting powerpoint \) and run the full show all of the content on liveweb slides displays perfectly i am using the add in unlike most the liveweb control is used on 70 different slides to show individual pdf or png files liveweb has been a huge help to us i know most others would use it on one possibly two slides in a presentation hats off to shyamlisa ! __eou__

hello patricia , thank you for the update on this issue i can understand the troubleshooting methods have not resulted positive as of now be rest assured we 'll be able to help you fix it let 's try running system file checker tool to repair missing or corrupted system files system file checker is a utility in windows that allows users to scan for corruptions in windows system files and restore corrupted files swipe in from the right edge of the screen , and then tap search or , if you are using a mouse , point to the lower right corner of the screen , and then click search type command prompt in the search box , right click command prompt , and then click run as administrator if you are prompted for an administrator password or for a confirmation , type the password , or click allow at the command prompt , type the following command , and then press enter sfc scannow after the process is finished , you may receive one of the following messages windows resource protection did not find any integrity violations windows resource protection could not perform the requested operation windows resource protection found corrupt files and successfully repaired them windows resource protection found corrupt files but was unable to fix some of them once you finish doing above troubleshooting steps please try switching from microsoft account to local account and then revert to microsoft account from local account following are the steps to switch to local account note by switching to local account you would not be able to login into apps or windows store automatically you have to use your microsoft account and password for every apps which require microsoft account credentials hope the information helps let us know if you need further assistance with windows related issues , we ll be glad to assist you __eou__

in microsoft excel how do you lookup a certain value in a row and then look up another value in that row and then count the amount of times that second value appears in the row is the question so in other words , the first value identifies the row the second value identifies what to look for in that row then instead of returning that exact value it returns the amount of times that value shows up in the specific row example so lets say you have a workweek sheet and a workweek summary sheet on the workweek sheet it highlights the workers and the work done at different times during the day on the summary sheet it uses that data to tell you who \( value 1 \) did what assignment \( value 2 \) and how many times they did it \( adding it \) of course that person would be doing different things during the day so it needs to be able to tell the difference \( case sensitive \) it does not need to tell you what time they did it since its based on a week that would be unnecessary data it just needs to tell you how many times they did a assignment during that week and since persons may change through out the week once you type in a name to search and work assignment it should auto change its total \( automated system i am looking for \) example code that did n't work but this is what i came up with match \( summary ! g 2 , index \( tuesday ! b 2 e 58 , match \( summary ! a5 , tuesday ! a 2 a 58 \) , \) \) summary ! a5 would be the person i look for in a row this is a vertical lookup of names \( summary sheet \) summary ! g 2 would be the assignment to look for on the workweek sheet but this \( text to look at \) is on the \( summary sheet \) tuesday ! b 2 e 58 would be the assignments to search through \( workweek sheet \) tuesday ! a 2 a 58 would be the row of names to search through \( workweek sheet \) its like a two way lookup but on the second look up it looks at the whole row and identifies all the matching values text in the row and adds the amount of times they show up __eou__
hi , share the link from where i can download your workbook also show the expected result there __eou__

formula in cell d1 sumproduct \( \( exact \( index \( b 2 o 58 , match \( a1 , a 2 a 58 , 0 \) , \) , b1 \) \) \) this identifies the row in column a which matces the cell a1 name and then from that row ie b2 o2 it counts the number of times as3 appears and this is a case sensitive match so that the 2 occurrences of as3 \( marked in red font \) are not counted in case you do not want case sensitive then use the below formula entered in cell c1 sumproduct \( \( index \( b 2 o 58 , match \( a1 , a 2 a 58 , 0 \) , \) b1 \) \) please adjust the range sheet names the above is illustrated in the same sheet for convenience in case this is your requirement regards , harry tandon www globaliconnect com __eou__

this worked great thankyou ! also though is there a way for it to work across many sheets even if the first value is not found \? for example sumproduct \( \( exact \( index \( test ! b 2 o 58 , match \( test ! a1 , a 2 a 58 , 0 \) , \) , b1 \) \) \) sumproduct \( \( exact \( index \( test2 ! b 2 o 58 , match \( test2 ! a1 , a 2 a 58 , 0 \) , \) , b1 \) \) \) sumproduct \( \( exact \( index \( test3 ! b 2 o 58 , match \( test3 ! a1 , a 2 a 58 , 0 \) , \) , b1 \) \) \) the only issue i have found with doing this is that if the first vaule being what to search for to identify the row is not found in one of the sheets , even if there found in the others it returns n a or the __eou__

try iferror \( sumproduct \( \( exact \( index \( test ! b 2 o 58 , match \( test ! a1 , a 2 a 58 , 0 \) , \) , b1 \) \) \) , 0 \) iferror \( sumproduct \( \( exact \( index \( test2 ! b 2 o 58 , match \( test2 ! a1 , a 2 a 58 , 0 \) , \) , b1 \) \) \) , 0 \) iferror \( sumproduct \( \( exact \( index \( test3 ! b 2 o 58 , match \( test3 ! a1 , a 2 a 58 , 0 \) , \) , b1 \) \) \) , 0 \) regards , alexis ogilvy __eou__
perfect thankyou ! __eou__

hi brittney , thank you for posting your query in microsoft community ideally , when you install a language pack or choose a different language other than your system language , most of the features are displayed in the modified language however , there are a few system settings that might still show up in the base language in that case , we might need to install the operating system afresh choosing the desired language as of now , i would suggest you to verify that you have followed the steps exactly as detailed below to select the english language \( ensure the keyboard settings and input methods are also set to the english language pack \) a press windows x key in the windows desktop and click control panel b open language c click on add a language and then select a desired language \( example english \) and click open d now select a language \( example english \( united states \) \) note once you are done with setting the desired language , restart the computer and check additional information hope this information is helpful please keep us updated with the status of the issue having followed the steps provided above , we 'll be glad to assist you further language packs are available for windows 8 and for windows rt __eou__

i have a table with a column of time stamps these come from an external source and the cell is configured as custom h mm i have created a 2nd table with deduplicated values of the time stamps then i am using a vlookup function to match the values from the deduplicated table to the original one some of the return values are correct , while others are incorrect , and i do n't understand why i 've tried to use value function and change the columns to another form of data other than time , but it did not work this is an example from the original table column a is the time stamps and column b is the return values from the second table \( below \) 0 11 11 1 06 18 1 09 21 1 11 23 2 06 15 2 05 29 1 03 11 2 10 34 1 02 11 2 06 15 2 06 15 6 06 78 3 05 14 this is the second table i have created 0 11 11 1 06 18 1 09 21 1 11 23 2 06 30 2 05 29 1 03 15 2 10 34 1 02 14 6 06 78 3 05 41 as you can see , values like 0 11 , 2 05 and 6 06 return correctly , while values for 2 06 and 3 05 do not i have no idea why this is happening any ideas \? p s the source of the original time stamp comes from a very old external software and there is no way to reimport the data differently __eou__

first , show us the vlookup formula in fact , show us all formulas and add cell references to your table details are important second , as a wild guess , if you use vlookup without a 4th parameter or 1 or true in the 4th parameter , there are two possible problems 1 the values in column a are not in ascending order 2 there might be binary arithmetic anomalies , such that two values that look the same actually differ infinitesimally \( and perhaps invisibly \) in their binary representation i suggest that you upload an example excel file \( redacted \) that demonstrates the problem to a file sharing website \( e g box net files \) so that we can see the details better post the public share url in a response here please test the url first , being careful to log out of the file sharing website __eou__
hi , time entries being left aligned hints towards them being text entries select only that column in both datasets and go to data text to columns finish does it work now \? __eou__

hi hayden , have you viewed joeu2004brittany 's reply \? i would like to explain that when we use vlookup , by default , the table must be sorted in an ascending order joeu2004brittany , ashishtroy mathur , thanks for your suggestions nimrodyanaihayden , in your case , i would like to suggest you use advance filter we do n't need to sort the data and delete duplicate data manually here are the detailed steps 1 create two sheets , named original and deduplicated the original data is copied from the table you provided 2 navigate to deduplicated , click data advanced the advanced filter dialogue box will appear select copy to another location 3 click list range original , choose the list range click copy to , choose where you want to place the filtered data select unique records only 4 click ok , the filtered data will appear regards , zixuandominic __eou__
hi hayden , have you tried the above steps \? please let us know if you need further help thanks , zixuandominic __eou__

thank you ! i was already copying the data to another table the issue was the sort order once i sorted the new table everything worked ! strange , i 've often worked with vlookup and never new it needed to search in ascending order to work that 's very useful for the future too ! thank you \) __eou__

solution move the original captures folder back to it 's original location make sure you do n't just copy and paste it , you need to cut and paste the folder so it properly goes back to it 's former location which can take some time to do once that is complete , if you want to move your pictures and or videos across to usb or another location open your captures folder and select all your files then cut and paste them into a new folder on your usb or other location the game bar will still work because it can find the captures folder in it 's original location and all the settings will be restored hope this resolves your question __eou__

hi brian , making your autotext entries live and shareable is a great idea however autotext entries are stored as building blocks to create a new entry , we will need to use the create new buiding block dialog box please note that quick parts is necessary to save the selection to the autotext gallery as of today , quick parts is not available in word online we suggest that you send your feedback ideas on this link so that this feature in be considered in future updates in word online feel free to post in the community if you have additional concerns __eou__

autotext entries are stored in templates by default , they are stored in the normal template , normal dotm only autotext entries stored in normal dotm will generate autocomplete tips , but they can be stored in any template you can create a special template that users can load as an add in if the template is stored in word 's startup folder , it will be loaded at startup , and autotext entries in the template will be available to all documents if users want to be able to take advantage of autocomplete , they can move the autotext entries from the add in to normal dotm using the building blocks organizer select any entry , click on edit properties , and , in the save in dropdown , change the location from the add in to normal dotm __eou__

i have a group evaluation in word where the group participant can give the following scores 3 very satisfactory , 2 satisfactory , 1 needs improvement , and 0 not applicable i need to average the text boxes only if they have a 1 , 2 , or 3 and not include the ones with 0 how do i write the formula \? the basic formula i know is average \( txt2 , txt3 , txt4 , txt5 , txt6 \) __eou__

you 'll need a field coded like quote set den txt2 0 txt3 0 txt4 0 txt5 0 txt6 0 0 if den 0 0 \( txt2 txt3 txt4 txt5 txt6 \) den note the field brace pairs \( i e ' ' \) for the above example are all created in the document itself , via ctrl f9 \( cmd f9 on a mac \) you ca n't simply type them or copy paste them from this message nor is it practical to add them via any of the standard word dialogues the spaces represented in the field constructions are all required __eou__

paul , thanks a bunch for this ! it works great can you explain what it all means , though it just would be helpful in case parts of it can be used in other functions i looked up quote field , but i could n't find anything about set den also , where do i insert a switch code to hide zero values \? thank you ! __eou__

the set field creates a bookmark \( in this case , named den 'denominator' abbreviated \) the value of that bookmark is given by the formula txt2 0 txt3 0 txt4 0 txt5 0 txt6 0 0 which simply provides a count of how many of txt2 txt6 are greater than 0 the if test compares the den value against 0 and , if it 's 0 , displays 0 as the result if it 's non zero , the formula \( txt2 txt3 txt4 txt5 txt6 \) den calculates the average of the non zero values the quote field simply serves as a wrapper to ensure the set if fields update as a group __eou__

hi daisy , welcome to microsoft answers ! in addition to coork 's post , you may follow these steps check if the issue persists in safe mode method 1 safe mode starts windows with a limited set of files and drivers startup programs do not run in safe mode , and only the basic drivers needed to start windows are installed safe mode is useful for troubleshooting problems with programs and drivers that might not start correctly , or that might prevent windows from starting correctly if a problem does not reappear when you start in safe mode , you can eliminate the default settings and basic device drivers as possible causes if a recently installed program , device , or driver prevents windows from running correctly , you can start your computer in safe mode and then remove the program that is causing the problem 1 restart your computer click the start button , click the arrow next to the lock button , and then click restart 2 do one of the following if your computer has a single operating system installed , press and hold the f8 key as your computer restarts you need to press f8 before the windows logo appears if the windows logo appears , you will need to try again by waiting until the windows logon prompt appears , and then shutting down and restarting your computer if your computer has more than one operating system , use the arrow keys to highlight the operating system you want to start in safe mode , and then press f8 3 on the advanced boot options screen , use the arrow keys to highlight the safe mode option you want , and then press enter log on to your computer with a user account that has administrator rights when your computer is in safe mode , you 'll see the words safe mode in the corners of the display to exit safe mode , restart your computer and let windows start normally if the issue does not occur in safe mode , perform a clean boot method 2 follow these steps to perform a clean boot note if the computer is connected to a network , network policy settings may prevent you from following these steps we strongly recommend that you do not use the system configuration utility to modify the advanced boot options on the computer unless a microsoft support engineer directs you to do this doing this may make the computer unusable a log on to the computer by using an account that has administrator rights b click start , type msconfig exe in the start search box , and then press enter to start the system configuration utility if you are prompted for an administrator password or for confirmation , type your password , or click continue c on the general tab , click selective startup , and then click to clear the load startup items check box \( the use original boot ini check box is unavailable \) d on the services tab , click to select the hide all microsoft services check box , and then click disable all note following this step lets microsoft services continue to run these services include networking , plug and play , event logging , error reporting , and other services if you disable these services , you may permanently delete all restore points do not do this if you want to use the system restore utility together with existing restore points e click ok , and then click restart note reset the computer to start as usual after you have finished troubleshooting , follow these steps to reset the computer to start as usual a click start , type msconfig exe in the start search box , and then press enter if you are prompted for an administrator password or for confirmation , type your password , or click continue b on the general tab , click the normal startup option , and then click ok c when you are prompted to restart the computer , click restart how to troubleshoot a problem by performing a clean boot in windows vista or in windows 7 http support microsoft com default aspx kb 929135 merry christmas ! regards , divya rchristina microsoft support visit our microsoft answers feedback forum and let us know what you think __eou__

hello christine , welcome to skype community forum ! unfortunately , we no longer have the option to customize skype name , upon creation at present , we only have 2 options to sign up for skype account 1 \) using mobile number and 2 \) using an email address both sign up process will provide you a skype account but the skype name is pre determined by our system if you sign up using mobile number , your skype name is live alphanumericdigits \) called lightweight account and if you sign up using email , your skype name is your email address i can understand that you 're used to having skype separated with microsoft however , as you know skype is now a program being owned by microsoft and the main reason why you are unable to create a separate skype account is to align skype 's usages and policy with microsoft as a part of our one microsoft program hope this information helps you a lot ! __eou__

you wo n't be able to create a shortcut to bing it is a web search engine press winkey r to open run box type www bing com press ok to launch an internet explorer which opens to bing set bing as your default search engine in any browser you may use this works for windows 7 and below when you launch the browser and perform a search , bing will be the search engine to set bing as your default search engine in internet explorer 9 , do the following 1 launch internet explorer and press f4 2 in the drop down menu , click on add in the lower right side of the menu which will take you to the internet explorer gallery 3 select bing from the list of search providers 4 in the confirmation box that appears , select the make this as my default search provider check box 5 click upgrade to set bing as your default search engine in internet explorer 10 , do the following 1 launch internet explorer 10 2 click the tools gear and select manage add ons 3 select search providers in the add on types column to view the current search engine selection 4 if you don t see bing listed , click on the find more search providers link on the bottom left portion of the window which will take you to the internet explorer gallery set bing com for your home page and once you launch the browser , it will open to bing http www bing com set homepage change your home page for internet explorer http windows microsoft com en us internet explorer change home page ie ie 11 __eou__

hi johnnyelia , thank you for getting back to us microsoft notification protocol \( msnp , also known as the mobile status notification protocol \) is an instant messaging protocol developed by microsoft for use by the microsoft messenger service and the instant messaging clients that connect to it , such as skype since 2014 , and the earlier windows live messenger , msn messenger , windows messenger , and microsoft messenger for mac third party clients such as pidgin and trillian can also communicate using the protocol msnp was first used in a publicly available product with the first release of msn messenger in 1999 this command resets this protocol please let us know if this command \( msnp24 \) works for you i hope this information helps rhiza ekimberly skype community moderator __eou__

hi , if you have an account with a web service like facebook , linkedin , or twitter , you can add it to your microsoft account this connects the two accounts and allows specific info to be shared between them so you can use it in your apps and other places where you sign in with a microsoft account for example , if you add an account that contains your friends' contact info , you can choose to show that info in the people and mail apps microsoft won t share info associated with your microsoft account without your permission you ll be asked to sign in to the account you 're adding , and to decide which types of info you want to share between your accounts add an account to your microsoft account go to the microsoft account overview webpage and sign in tap or click permissions , and then tap or click add accounts tap or click the account that you want to add , and follow the instructions remove an account from your microsoft account go to the microsoft account overview webpage and sign in tap or click permissions , and then tap or click manage accounts you ll see a list of all the accounts that you ve added to your microsoft account tap or click edit by the account you want to remove tap or click remove this connection completely __eou__

since we recently encountered this problem , i thought it would help to share our findings the issue is that excel for mac does not properly 'parse' the information in the header cells so if you have carriage returns or line breaks in your header row , the field values will look wrong the fix is to edit the header rows of the source and remove any carriage returns or line breaks this will not fix any existing pivot tables , but the field list will display properly for new pivot tables __eou__

according to the article at http support microsoft com kb 883821 , which is about errors during attempts to use windows update , the 0x80072ee7 error code may occur if the client computer cannot find the correct ip address when it tries to resolve a url for the windows update web site or for the microsoft update web site this error may occur if the hosts file contains a static ip address the same error number might occur when the office installer tries to reach the activation server , if there is a problem with that address \( not the windows update site \) it 's worth checking the reason given in the article \( a static ip address in the hosts file \) there are instructions in the resolution section , under the 0x80072ee7 error code heading , for how to find and read the file except in very unusual circumstances , every line in the file can be commented out by putting a character at the left margin a static ip address is n't the only possibility it 's also possible that during the installation activation you do n't have a working internet connection , or that you do n't have access to a domain name service \( dns \) server , or \( unlikely \) that the dns has a bad address for microsoft __eou__

try also to disable the dnscache under your windows services \( winxp \) 1 right click my computer 2 manage 3 services and applications 4 services 5 dns client 6 click stop services 7 thats it __eou__

hi , welcome to microsoft answers i suggest you to follow the below steps 1 insert the dvd in the cddvd drive 2 open computer , click on dvd drive , and select the files you want to copy to select all files , press ctrl and a keys together , to select files randomly press ctrl and left mouse click on the file 3 right click on the selected files , click on copy 4 select the location where you want to save those files , right click and paste it if you are copying the music from an audio cd , then you need to rip the music here are the steps 1 for best results , make sure that you are connected to the internet before you begin when your computer is connected to the internet , the player attempts to retrieve media information about the tracks being ripped from an online database the player then adds the information to the files during ripping note that you can rip a cd when your computer is n't connected to the internet however , the player wo n't be able to identify the name of the cd , the artist who created it , or the names of the songs until you go online 2 insert an audio cd into the cd drive 3 \( optional \) if you want to select a different format \( for example , mp3 instead of wma \) or bit rate \( for example , 192 kbps instead of 128 kbps \) for the files created during ripping , in the player library , click the rip settings menu , and then click format or audio quality 4 \( optional \) if you do n't want to rip every song , in the player library , clear the check boxes next to the songs you do n't want to rip 5 click the rip cd button in now playing mode or rip cd in the player library to begin ripping after the songs have been ripped , you can find and play them in the player library for more information refer this link http windows microsoft com en us windows7 rip music from a cd please respond back for the status on the issue and let us know if you have any issues thanks and regards , ricky microsoft support __eou__

drive \) windows re installs a fresh copy of windows windows re restores the data , settings , and apps it has set aside into the newly installed copy of windows the pc restarts into the newly hi amanda , to get the embedded word document icon to position inside a cell and lock it , please perform the following steps 1 adjust the icon bounding box 's height and width , and move it to position inside a cell 2 right click on the icon click format object properties move and size with cells ok 3 select the other cells right click on the selected area click format cells protection uncheck locked button ok 4 click tools in the top menu bar protection protect sheet ok for the requirement to make the bounding box of the embedded word document invisible , we can not achieve it we welcome and encourage you to share your idea through user voice many features have been designed or upgraded based on customers' ideas it is the best way to perfect our products thanks for your understanding , tinajessica __eou__

the direct answers to your initial 3 questions are a couple of points first foremost objects cannot be inserted into cells period what jessica attempted to describe as well as any other 'tutorials' you find may be well intended but are a misrepresentation of what actually is being done essentially , the object can be locked into position on a sheet so that it appears to be contained within a cell in truth , the object still floats on the surface of the sheet second keeping the object anchored in place requires 2 conditions as you 've found , however , with protection enabled the object icon is rendered as a static graphic cannot be opened although it is n't exactly what you want , the only option i can suggest is to insert a hyperlink to the document in a cell an icon could be included as well with the hyperlink in an adjacent cell the hyperlink will work even when protection is enabled to preserve the positioning of the icon a down side of this method , though , is that a copy of the document is not embedded in the excel file , so a copy of the document must travel with the workbook __eou__

this is simple enough to test insert any random picture or paste in a screen shot , save the presentation , copy the picture a few times onto new slides , save again to a new name does the size of the presentation file increase trump bigly trump or just a little bit \? in the windows versions of ppt , for quite a few versions back , if you insert an image once then copy paste it to other slides within the same presentation , ppt stores only one instance of the image and points to it from the other slides it actually even tries to do this when you insert the image several times \( via insert picture \) if it figures out that you 've inserted an existing pic a second time , it uses the original i 'd be quite surprised if the mac version does n't do the same thing \( at least the current version \) but so as not to totally somewhat disagree with yolanda \( a bad idea as a rule \) he 's completely right that there 's almost never any need to pop images that large into ppt __eou__

hello , please , i need help as i search for a code which sum count the all colored cells in a range , but not sum cells formatted with a specific color as you could see below i have a lot of colored cells , that i need to sum the content of the all of it gratefully , __eou__

try this user defined function function sum colored cells \( r as range , sample as range \) s 0 for each c in r if c interior color sample interior color then s s c value end if next c sum colored cells s end function the first parameter , r , should be the range to be considered and the second parameter , sample , should be a cell that has the same color as the cells that you want to sum hope this helps kenneth __eou__

hello lars the udf used to sum the range based on color , i want the opposite , i ask to count the non withe cells all the colored in a range and also the code sum the content only i need also to count the colored cells thanks a lot , __eou__

try this udf function colored cells \( func as string , r as range \) as double n 0 s 0 for each c in r if c interior color 16777215 then n n 1 s s c value end if next c select case func case count colored cells n case sum colored cells s end select end function if you give the value count for the first parameter , the result will be the number of non white cells in the range r if you give the value sum for the first parameter , the result will be the sum of the content in the non white cells in the range r hope this helps kenneth __eou__
hi lars thanks a lot , your code works like a charm __eou__

hello , i'm wondering if is posible to introduce a if formula , i have made a table with some vacantions starting on different dates example spain , 15 10 2017 spain , 20 10 2017 spain , 30 , 10 2017 portugal , 25 11 2017 portugal , 30 11 2017 and so on i have many check in dates is posible to introduce a if formular to see only further check in dates \? i do n't really want to see spain , 15 06 2017 , only what remains to come i guess i can put into a cell dunno ex d2 cell , 30 09 2017 and into the entire collumn if \( d2 eallier then 30 09 2017 , if yes , hide , if no , show something like that ps meanwhile i am thinking also a if formula to see the next departures between x date and y date \( ex departures from 01 10 to 30 10 2017 \) thank you in advance ! __eou__

first , formulas will not hide or unhide rows or columns you can apply a filter to the data and set up the criteria you want when a condition is applied to a filter , then the rows that do n't meet that condition will be hidden regards , laura ogilvy __eou__
sound interesting enough , can you , please , give me some more details \? __eou__

select your data , go to the home tab , go way to the right and select sort filter in the editing area then select filter this should put dropdowns in the top row of your data go to the column with date and choose number filters you can then specify your criteria you example shows spain , 15 10 2017 i am assuming that this means spain is in say a2 and 15 10 2017 is in b2 then the filter dropdown selected would be for column b you would select date filters , then go to the bottom of the list and select custom you would get the dialog i show in the image there you would go to the left dropdown and select the condition , then enter the date in the right textbox then click ok this will hide the rows that do n't meet the condition you would to sort filter and select clear in the menu dropdown to clear the filter \( or click filter to remove the dropdowns if you wish \) you can filter on multiple columns say if you wanted to look at just portugal after 15 10 2017 as an example __eou__
thank you very much for your time and for your explanation ! ! __eou__

we purchased the acer aspire one d257 1880and the windows 7 starter edition is in french language and we cannot seem to change it to english please help us ! thank you __eou__

install complete language with a language pack \( lp \) mui language packs \( or mui multilingual user interface \) language packs provide a translated version of windows dialog boxes , menu items , and help content switching to certain languages with a language pack , such as english , spanish , french , german , chinese , and others , requires your computer to be running windows 7 ultimate you can download any of the available language packs by using windows update if you do n't have ultimate you can do an anytime upgrade to ultimate http go microsoft com fwlink \? linkid 125894 anytime upgrade to windows 7 ultimate type anytime upgrade in the search programs and files box in the start menu and click on the windows anytime upgrade icon from there , you can buy an anytime upgrade to windows 7 ultimate then your can enter your anytime upgrade product key and perform a simple upgrade to windows 7 ultimate so you can install a different language all programs and files will stay on the computer if you 're unable to buy online in your area a local store may sell anytime upgrades , or you can buy the version of windows 7 you want http windows microsoft com en us windows7 products windows anytime upgrade install new multilingual user interface \( mui \) in windows 7 ultimate 1 click start and type windows update in the search box 2 click windows update in the programs list 3 click optional updates and go to the section windows 7 language packs note if the optional update link ca n't be found , click check online for updates from microsoft update to search the optional updates 4 check the language pack you want and click ok 5 proceed with install updates how to change the windows 7 display language 1 go to start control panel clock , language , and region change the display language 2 switch the display language in the choose a display language drop down menu 3 click ok 4 restart for the changes to take effect \( this will affect only the user profile under which you are currently logged on \) how to install and uninstall a windows 7 language pack http support microsoft com kb 972813 __eou__

you will first need to do an anytime upgrade from starter to ultimate in french then you can download the english language pack through windows update to get additional muis by using windows update muis are available through windows update as optional updates they are n't installed automatically click to type windows update hit enter in the left pane , click check for updates , and then wait while windows looks for the latest updates for your computer if any updates are found , click select optional updates select the mui that you want , and then click ok click install updates if you are prompted for an administrator password or confirmation , type the password or provide confirmation how to do an anytime upgrade click start , type anytime upgrade , click the option to purchase a key wait while the anytime upgrade page is loaded , click the windows 7 ultimate upgrade to buy it click next , fill out your contact information \( it is important you do this , since the product key will be emailed to you as a backup just in case you need to reinstall it \) enter your credit card information , click next to begin the upgrade , wait while the key is verified , accept the license agreement , click upgrade , wait while the software upgrades , \( it might take 10 minutes or more depending on if updates are needed \) , your computer will automatically restart , after restarting , windows 7 will notify you its updating the computer , the computer will restart one more time automatically and the upgrade will be completed , a windows will pop up notifying the upgrade was successful and your computer is ready to use , click close , you should be upgraded to windows 7 ultimate your files , programs and settings preserved , proceed to activate windows 7 ultimate here is an example of how to download , install and switch languages before you can start using a language in windows 7 ultimate , you must first download and install it microsoft offers up to 35 different multi lingual user interfaces through its windows update service lets take a look at how to install and configure one for the purposes of this example , we are gonna install spanish first , launch windows update click check for updates click the optional updates are available link here you will see a list of available languages for download check the desired language you would like to have installed , then click ok you will be taken back to the main screen , click install update wait while the update is downloading installing the language pack after the installation has completed , we will now enable the language pack click start , then type language hit enter on your keyboard click on the keyboard and languages tab under choose a display language , click in the list box and select the language you want to have displayed click apply and then ok you will be prompted to log off now do so then log back in that s it , you are now operating in windows 7 using a different language when you are ready to change back to another language , just reopen the region and language dialog and select your default language that s it ! resources see http support microsoft com kb 972813 if not , see http windows microsoft com en us windows7 add or change an input language http windows microsoft com en us windows7 products features language packs http windows microsoft com en us windows7 if you can print a test page from the printer , at least the printer 's hardware seems to be functioning when you mentioned that you ca n't print a test page from within device manager do you really mean from the devices and printers window \? that is , the usual method for printing test pages is to right click on a printer 's icon in devices and printers , select printer properties and use the print test page button from the general tab of the printer properties dialog the hp laserjet pro p1102 is one of hp 's lower cost host based printers this means that the computer itself is used to perform all of the print processing i'm not very familiar with this type of printer , but i 'll try to help you out open devices and printers if you go to control panel programs and features \( click start , type programs and features in the search box , and press enter \) , what hp software is listed there \? although you did n't specifically say so , it sounds as if you have at least one other printer installed on this computer is that an hp printer also \? microsoft used to have an automated fixit routine that solved a great many printer problems the article describing the fixit is still online at https support microsoft com en us help 2793718 you experience print spooler error messages after installing or upgrad like much of windows 7 support , however , microsoft retired this fixit , as you will see if you click the buttons on that page fortunately , the guts of that routine were saved by the microsoft print team and are still available , although things are not quite as automated as they once were the fixit has two modes , light and full although i suspect that the light mode will not fix your problem , it wo n't adversely affect your system and you may want to try it while i'm waiting for your response to the above questions the full mode may well solve your problem although it 's primarily intended for the more usual printer based printing problems i have n't used it on a system with a host based printer , but it should work here as well the catch with the full mode , however , is that it removes all printers , even those that are now working properly all printers would have to be freshly installed that 's one of the reasons i asked if you had other printers installed here are directions to using the fixit \( note that if you do n't include a parameter such as light after the name of the script , you 'll get a full description of what the script does in both light and full modes \) __eou__

i just got in to work about 45 minutes ago i did follow your instructions i also checked what was in the print queue again there were three hp laser jet p1102w printers shown one was ghosted with an exclamation point one was clear with an exclamation point one was listed as copy 3 i checked the queues for the two that were n't ghosted , although i had done that multiple times yesterday there were documents there which were n't there yesterday and i canceled them low and behold , the printer , copy 3 , prints ! ! i just went to devices and printers again to make sure that the information that you requested was still valid the second hp p1102w was gone from the devices and printers page now i just have copy 3 and the ghosted copy so , unless the ghosted copy will cause me problems in the future , i think i'm a happy camper ! thank you for all of your help and for your patience i can usually figure things out by myself , but this situation had me stumped regards , daniel __eou__

congratulations ! you 'll probably want to leave things alone , but in case you do n't this \( https h30434 www3 hp com t5 laserjet printing why are there two icons for my p1102w in devices and td p 2157411 \) may explain the second \( ghosted icon \) or it may not also see post 4 here https www sevenforums com drivers 229868 ghost printer devices printers i can not remove html hp 's smart install was a feature built into the firmware of some printers , including the p1102w \) if you connected a printer with smart install by a usb cable to an internet connected computer , the computer would automatically go to hp 's servers , find , download , and install the correct driver hp disabled the servers that supported smart install but apparently printers with this feature sometimes keep trying anyway unless smart install is disabled see the first article above for details if you do n't have the cd that came with the printer , the smart install control utility is still downloadable from https support hp com us en drivers selfservice swdetails hp laserjet pro p1102 printer series 4110394 model 4110303 switemid lj 129224 1 if you get bothered by looking at copy 3 as part of the printer 's name , you can right click on the icon in devices and printers , select printer properties and rename it on the general tab it ca n't be the same as the name used by the ghost printer so if you do n't remove that one , you 'll have to give it some other name __eou__

hi dj my name is ron yes , having too many unused styles in the document complicates it and can lead to document corruption i have several documents i collect info from the web into they are constantly adding unused styles that i clean up actually , it is a 2 step process first delete unused styles , then i go through remaining extra styles and apply my standard styles before deleting the now unused style here are some macros you can play with to find one that works best for you determining how many styles are available http word tips net t000803 determining how many styles are available html summary got a macro that processes or uses styles \? you definitely need to know how many styles word has available in the document use the count property of the styles collection to determine the figure finding unused styles http word tips net t001488 finding unused styles html summary use this vba macro to determine which styles are being used in the current word document removing unused styles http word tips net t001337 removing unused styles html summary got an older document that has a bunch of unused styles defined in it \? you can get rid of those styles easily by using the short macro in this tip delete unused styles \( take 2 \) http word mvps org faqs numbering removemanualnumbers htm this macro below and at this site is excellent but i notice it does not exactly remove all manually outlined numbered paragraphs which have been converted to normal or plain text like any article heading or even a , b , numbering for certain paragraphs however , it does remove 1 1 , \( a \) , etc numbering which i find odd delete unused styles \( tip \) the use of style delete is not the best way to go if multiple styles are deleted by the loop the time taken blows out exponentially and will typically be 30 minutes to delete 100 styles instead use application organizerdelete source activedocument path activedocument name , name ostyle namelocal , object wdorganizerobjectstyles it will then take only a few seconds to delete 100 or more styles i have a few more \( long \) macros that do n't have links if the above ones do n't do it for you bonus style report add in http gregmaxey mvps org word tip pages style report addin html with style report , users can quickly loop through the style collection and with the user interface provided make a decision to keep or delete the styles used in a document or previously used styles that are not applied to any text with finished , style report summarized user actions and reports style status __eou__
thanks very much for the thorough answer ! __eou__
thanks very much ! __eou__

if you want to remove all unused styles in your documents , this can best be done with a macro attached to a new button on your ribbon 1 go to the view ribbon macros view macros 2 give the new macro this name deleteunusedstyles 3 click the 'create' button 4 in the resulting window , select the newly created macro and copy the text below in its place , then hit ctrl s to save the new macro sub deleteunusedstyles \( \) dim ostyle as style for aaronach ostyle in activedocument styles 'only check out non built in styles if ostyle builtin false then with activedocument content find clearformatting style ostyle namelocal eaaronxecute findtext , format true if found false then ostyle delete eaaronnd with eaaronnd if next ostyle eaaronnd sub 5 then click file options customize ribbon 6 under choose commands from , click macros 7 select the macro you just created 8 under customize the ribbon , click the tab and custom group where you want to add the macro 9 click add 10 click rename and type a meaningful name for the button 11 click ok twice now on any document you open you can click that new button and any styles not used in the document will automatically be deleted __eou__

split from this thread this might be a stupid question , but if i show word preferences to use centimeters as the system of measurements and i enter the conversion of 3 4 to 1 91 cm and 1 2 to 1 27 cm would that not then cause the margins to replicate the original margins of 3 4 and 1 2 \? or , because word 2016 is programmed differently it wo n't matter it 'll still spread my book out anyway \? what 's your suggestion to best replicate my original settings \? i'm really trying to avoid having to reformat every page to a variety of font sizes i do n't want just to fit the same text on a page i should n't have to reformat part to 12 point size text and another to 11 when originally it was all formatted to 13 point and fit perfectly i hope i'm not wearing out my welcome with so many questions thanks __eou__

hi jim my name is ron no it is not a stupid question , just a question to the best of my knowledge , yes , doing the conversion you describe should result in the same margins have you tried it and encountered a problem \? __eou__

what may be a key factor imperial to metric often is not an exact equivalent in most software due to rounding for example , 5 does convert to 1 27 cm , but 75 converts to 1 9 cm because the absolute conversion value is 1 905 cm changing the margin to 1 91 cm \( especially if done for both top bottom or both sides \) in an existing document can be enough to cause the text flow problem if you want to change the measurement system in an existing document it 's best to to accept the conversion done by the program in most cases the text flow will not be altered significantly , if at all __eou__
