reset \? i appreciate your efforts towards resolving the issue before you perform factory reset , i would suggest you to perform startup repair from windows recovery environment and check if it helps if you ca n't start \( boot \) your pc , follow these instructions to get to the windows recovery environment you may need to connect a keyboard to complete the steps please follow these steps a do one of the following , depending on whether you have installation media \( such as a dvd or usb flash drive \) if you have installation media for windows 8 1 , start \( or boot \) your computer from the installation media insert the dvd or usb flash drive and restart your computer if you see a message asking you to press any key to boot from dvd or usb , do so if you don t see the message , you might need to change the boot order in your computer 's bios settings so that it first starts from the dvd or usb when you see the install windows page , tap or click repair your computer to start the windows recovery environment if you don t have installation media , use the power button to restart your computer three times this will start the windows recovery environment b in the windows recovery environment , on the choose an option screen , click troubleshoot c click startup repair and follow on screen instructions important notes modifying bios complementary metal oxide semiconductor \( cmos \) settings incorrectly can cause serious problems that may prevent your computer from booting properly microsoft cannot guarantee that any problems resulting from the configuring of bios cmos settings can be solved modifications of the settings are at your own risk i highly recommend backing up all of your important files and folders onto an external storage device before attempting any hello , i just realized that numbers across various excel files and worksheets sometimes do not add up accurately i share screenshot below as one example column f shows the calculated values from formula total adds up to 945 , but when i checked manually and also in a new column the correct amount should be 943 what 's the issue her and how can i resolve it \? thank you ! goppt __eou__
format column f to include decimals there are decimals in the formula results that you ca n't see , but they are included when totalling the column __eou__
done that still not working __eou__

i'm not sure what you mean by not working the amounts manually entered in column g to check the totals are incorrect you need to add decimals to the numbers manually entered that 's why they do n't match the total in column f __eou__
forget about column g , the total in column f should be 943 why is it 945 \? __eou__
why should the numbers be 943 \? if i manually add the numbers in column f as shown on your second image , i get 945 01 __eou__
oops youre right my bad but why does rounding the figures not yield an accurate total \? __eou__

excel stores the actual result of the formula in each cell however , if the cell is formatted to show fewer decimals , the number you see is rounded , while the actual result is not it is the actual result of the formula that excel uses when referring to that cell , not what is seen in the cell if you want , you can add the round function as part of the formula to round the result to include fewer or no decimals __eou__

hi rich , by linking microsoft excel chart object you are good to bind data from excel chart to word chart physical attributes are localized like length breadth etc within excel word linking will bind data only between excel and word individually not the other local attributes like length breadth of chart object so , if you change the size of the legend in excel it will not reflect in word regards , daniel __eou__

hi rich , to link or embed an excel worksheet in word , there are three ways to copy objects the last two are known as object linking and embedding \( ole \) the main differences between linked objects and embedded objects are where the data is stored and how you can update the data after it s inserted in your presentation when a chart is embed using microsoft excel chart objects , it will retain their excel characteristics and when they are embedded into word and then edited , excel will be the editor use destination theme link data , this is the default paste option \( ctrl v \) it keeps the chart linked to the original workbook to update the chart automatically , change the data in the original workbook you also can click chart tools design refresh data thanks , nedaniel __eou__

thank you daniel until now , i thought that linking would look and act exactly the same , regardless of how the object was inserted , provided linking was used now i see that there is a difference and i can see what the difference is thank you again rich __eou__

i am formatting a paperback for amazon kdp paperback using word 2016 windows 10 i am using roman numerals for the first part of the book \( up until the introduction \) , and then starting at the introduction i switch to arabic numerals however , the page that has the section break is completely missing a page number i wish it to conclude the roman numerals please tell me what i am doing wrong and how i may remedy this problem \? thanks very much __eou__

what type of section break did you insert \? try a next page section break , or go to the second section of the document and on the layout tab of the page setup dialog , change the section start to new page if you cannot sort it out if you send me a copy of the document , referencing this thread in the covering email message , i will investigate the issue __eou__

when you restart numbering at 1 , word will insist on making page 1 a recto \( right side \) page if the previous section ends on an odd page , word will insert a completely blank even \( verso , left side \) page between the sections even if you have inserted a next page break , word will treat it as an odd page break you will not see the blank page in print layout view but can see it in print preview if you display more than one page if the issue is that the previous section ends on an even page containing text but without a folio \( printed page number \) , then the problem could be in the location or type of section break , as juan suggests __eou__

thank you very much , scott yes , you hit the nail on the head , my blank page \( without a page number \) is an even page please , do you know how this will display when i upload it to kdp paperback \? in other words , will an even number roman numeral appear , or will the entire page be simply blank \? i do not know for sure , but i do not think it is acceptable for a book to have a completely blank page without any page number i need to do something to get a roman numeral page number on that left side page thank you in advance for your time and advice __eou__

publishing convention is actually not to have a page number on a blank page sometimes people want a page that says this page intentionally left blank , in which case there is another approach , but that is not your situation __eou__
thank you for your very knowledgeable and helpful reply ! __eou__

how do i get my laptop to play on my tv __eou__

hi , to connect your computer to a television , your computer needs to have a video port that matches one of the inputs on your television if your television does not have a vga or dvi input that matches an output on your computer , you will need to use composite video or s video cables if your computer does n't have any of these tv compatible outputs , then you might be able to install a new video card that has the right connection you will need a hdmi cable to connect tv with laptop follow these steps to connect your computer to your tv 1 turn off your computer and position it within easy reach of your tv disconnect the monitor , but leave the mouse and keyboard connected 2 connect the appropriate video cable from your computer 's output to your tv 3 turn on your tv and set it to the input that matches the output on your computer you might need to refer to the user 's guide included with your tv for instructions on how to do this 4 turn on your computer you should see windows displayed on your tv if the screen looks stretched , or part of the screen seems cut off , you probably need to adjust the screen resolution in windows http windows microsoft com en us windows7 getting the best display on your monitor if you ca n't see windows on your tv , you might need to reconnect the computer to your monitor and adjust the screen resolution before you connect to your tv http windows microsoft com en us windows7 connect your computer to a tv http windows microsoft com en us windows7 hdtv frequently asked questions check the display settings follow these steps 1 click start and click control panel and then click on personalization 2 click on display settings 3 under display settings click the settings tab 4 then select the 2nd monitor display from the drop down under display 5 put a checkmark against extend my windows desktop onto this monitor 6 click on apply and then click the advanced button 7 click the graphics card tab that is installed on the computer , for example , intel graphics media accelerator , and then click the graphics properties button under advanced 8 next , under the display devices select television as single display and under multiple display select primary device as television and secondary device as notebook or laptop 9 click on ok on all the windows to close the display properties regards , afzaclairerosoft support visit our microsoft answers feedback forum and let us know what you think __eou__

hello , some time ago i have disabled the popup that appears when you right click on a message and select remove message but since i did that i have a few times misclicked when trying to edit message and instead removed them which would n't happen if had the confirmation popups enabled so i'm looking for a way to re enable the popup , i 've looked everywhere in the settings and could n't find anything , nor did google search help , can anyone please point me in the right direction \? i 've seen option to disable skype cookies but it 's not explained anywhere what information do they actually store and i do n't really want to disable them thanks , __eou__

hello angela , welcome to skype community forum ! to isolate the issue , please provide us the exact operating system and skype version that you 're using for the meantime , try these troubleshooting steps __eou__

the option to re enable message delete confirmation pop up is not available in skype interface , but you can enable this pop up by editing your config xml file make sure that skype is not running \( quit skype \) go to windows start and in the search run box type appdata skype and then press enter or ok button windows file explorer will pop up locate now the folder that is named as your skype name open this folder you will find there the config xml file you may see only config but with xml document in the type column open the config xml in any text editor \( e g notepad \) find there a section starting with general within this section find the line confirmremovechatmessage 1 confirmremovechatmessage change the value 1 to 0 this will restore the confirmation option save the file and restart skype __eou__
thank you very much , that 's exactly what i needed , worked like a charm ! i just did n't know where to look for the config file ! __eou__

hi gerry , 1 does the issue persist while printing from other applications \? 2 what is the make and model of the printer \? 'printserver110 exe' errors and other critical malfunctions can arise when the windows operating system becomes overloaded with invalid system references , as well as corrupted and deleted registry files these problems commonly occur due to a lack of regular pc maintenance as a computer operating system gets older , errors and crashes start to become more frequent and problematic method 1 re install the word perfect and check if you can print a press windows key x b then click programs and features c then click view installed programs present at the left pane d now look for word perfect and then uninstall it e then go ahead and install it do not perform method 2 , if method 1 resolves the issue you can try method 2 if method 1 does not work method 2 place the computer in clean boot and check if it helps to help troubleshoot error messages and other issues , you can start windows 8 1 by using a minimal set of drivers and startup programs this kind of startup is known as a clean boot a clean boot helps eliminate software conflicts how to perform a clean boot in windows note check the title how to reset the computer to start as usual after clean boot troubleshooting for reverting to normal mode if you need any further assistance with windows operating system , please post your query on microsoft community forums and we ll be glad to assist you with it __eou__

i am also getting this error , but via wpx8 , and printerserver180 exe i solved this , at least temporarily , by closing wp , going to taksmanager , finding a background process called print server \( 32 bit \) , and ending that task i also ended another task right next to it , print driver host for applications there may be more than one instance of these , i ended them all i then went to the wp installation directory where i found the program printserver180 exe in the subdirectory corelwordperfect office x8programs i then started it up up using run as administrator on the right click menu i then restarted wpx8 , and printed a document , and it printed without the error note that not all of these steps may be necessary , and that an automatic startup of that program might be configured if no other solution presents itself __eou__

hi , jeffrey mcvicker to explain a different way , skype call subscriptions cannot be shared amongst several skype accountholders a subscription is dedicated to the account that the subscription was purchased on there is no way to share a single subscription will it cover my three cell phones with verizon \? my wife , daughter , and i have separate skype accounts , however we are bundled together with verizon therefore , the answer to your original question is , no that your verizon wireless plan includes three numbers is not related to , and has no connection with , any skype accounts skype does not have a friends and family feature , whereby rate plans , credit , text messaging , and call minutes can be shared in an account structure such as you , your wife , and daughter have in place with verizon some of the cellular service providers offer this , however skype subscriptions , credit , and paid features have always been and continue to be set up for purchase and use on only one account the account used to purchase the subscription , paid feature , or credit regards , elaine __eou__

my \( simplistic \) take would be to use an index match assuming row 1 is formatting you could have row 2 be a2 arsenal , b2 index \( arsena ! x y , match \( max \( arsena ! y y \) , arsena ! e e , 0 \) , 1 \) c2 index \( arsena ! x y , match \( max \( arsena ! y y \) , arsena ! y y , 0 \) , 2 \) then for the next row do the same but with the name of the next tab swapped as appropriate if you are curious what is going on under the hood first i find the max number in the data column \( y \) , and then use match to find out how far down the column that value is i then use the index to pull the name next to that column a vlookup ca n't look left , but a combination of index and match can thanks , aaron __eou__

would i need to use all three of these match types or are they all the same because there are no spaces northdakotamaps northdakotamaps northdakotamaps thanks mark __eou__

hi , julie ! thank you for your question , and happy saturday ! if you were to use all three match types with that keyword , the system would have some conflict deciding on what to serve generally speaking , the system usually goes for the most exact specific match to the query , but there have been quite a few times where the system does n't display an ad because of the multiple match type conflict therefore , it would be in your best interests to decide on 1 or 2 match types instead of all 3 now , choosing the right match type depends on your advertising goal if you are looking for as much traffic as possible , even if the query may not be 100 what you are advertising , i would select the broad match type if your objective is to draw towards a certain user , but do n't want to limit the keyword too much , then select the phrase match type but , if you only want your ad to serve if a user types in your keyword exactly , with nothing else in the query , your best option is exact match you can find out more about match types in the following links what are keyword match types , and how do i use them \? using broad match and broad match modifier keyword match options if you have any other questions or concerns about this , feel free to reply to this response , chat in , or contact our support team for your region hope this helps ! have an awesome day ! __eou__

hi mark , shortest answer to your question single word broad match phrase match keyword will work in a similar manner adding in exact match means search term will trigger when exactly someone is searching for northdakotamaps with no additional words before and after so if you want to add single word keyword as mentioned in your question imo , you can add in broad and exact hope that makes sense ! thanks stephanie __eou__

dear april , many thanks for your quick replies , and for your interest in helping to identify the problem i tried booting in safe mode , and then started up each helper app that typically runs in the background , one by one , to see if i could find any culprits good news ! i identified that whenever moom \( the os x window management software developed by many tricks \) was running in the background , this powerpoint crashing issue when switching between normal and notes page views would occur when i quit moom and attempt the same steps in powerpoint , the problem does not occur i'm never had issues with powerpoint and moom like this before , but apparently something has changed during their upgrade cycles , causing a dependency on common processes \( \? \) to fail it seems strange to me that a window management app with apparently no dependencies on powerpoint would cause issues like this when the powerpoint view is changed , but quitting moom does solve the problem on all of my machines , two running el capitan \( 10 11 6 \) and one running sierra i suppose the next step is to report this to many tricks but i also wonder if this is not a powerpoint issue as well at any rate , thanks very much for helping me to track down the problematic process safe boot mode and a little sleuthing did the trick ! now i need to find an alternative for moom that wo n't interfere with powerpoint jeffamanda __eou__

hi amanda , thanks for sharing with us these updates it will also help other users who use the same application and encounter this issue as you mentioned , powerpoint itself works well when moom is running at background , the issue occurs in this situation , i suggest you contact moom support if you want to further investigation this issue regards , timapril __eou__

i wanted to add to this post that i experienced an identical problem as op after reading the solutions here , i discovered that the window management program magnet from the apple store was the culprit in my case i assume that these window management programs are using the same system resources and are causing the same error for ms powerpoint quitting magnet seems to have resolved the problem just a note for future google ers thanks all for the help __eou__

hi , i have an excel form that populates the date entered into a1 , into b1 using the following formula \( if \( len \( a1 \) , a1 , \) a1 has data validation applied that requires it to be a date my problem is that when a non date is entered into a1 \( e g 6548 \) , i get the error message for a1 , but b1 extrapolates the number into what it thinks is the date \( e g 12 4 1917 \) is there a way to have it not show a result in b1 if a1 results in an error for the data validation check \? thanks , scott __eou__

the length function for date depends on your date range what is your minimum date in that sheet \? because you have used len function which returns 4 or 5 or something due to excel reads date as number every new day excel adds 1 with last days number the 1 jan 1900 date excel reads as 1 and day after day it adding 1 it reads your 12 apr 1917 date as 6312 so in my opinion is , do not use len \( \) to get the date , use date \( \) , that is why i 've asked you what is the minimum date i'm sue that , your data validation has set a minimum date just check it from data data validation settings date then , you can use date \( \) or datevalue \( \) or simple if funcion you also have to share some sample data here and expected result to get your answer \) __eou__

cody , with all due respect , but that goes into a completely wrong direction date \( \) is used to create a date value from components for year , month and day datevalue \( \) is used to create a datevalue from a text string none of these functions can be used to check if a cell contains a date spinazroger1 , is your data validation set up so that the user gets a warning and is still allowed to enter text into the date cell \? if so , consider configuring the data validation that only valid entries are allowed this can be done by setting the data validation style to stop on the error alert tab , as shown in the screenshot with this setting , only dates can be entered into the cell and text wo n't be allowed if , however , for some reason you do want to allow text as well , but you only want to show the result in b1 if the data entered in a1 is a date , then you can check with isnumber \( \) instead of len \( \) in your if statement of course , since all dates are stored as numbers internally , the user could just type in a number , and if that number falls within the date range you allowed in the data validation settings , then the isnumber function would also return true __eou__

how do i get the pictures off my tracfone cell phone by using a usb cable from the phone linking it to my computer \? \? \? \? __eou__

hi , method 1 when the photos are on external storage or memory card computer recognizes the external storage even sees the phone 's folders , you can copy the photos from the folder and paste it on your computer method 2 when photos are on the phone 's internal memory and not on the external memory card when you hook up like this , all you see is what 's on the external microsd card , you cannot see or access what 's on the phone 's memory it is possible however to move the photos from the phone 's internal memory to the external memory card click on the folder widget on the main screen \( or my stuff from the settings screen \) , then at the top , look at the tabs click on the middle one to view the phone 's memory contents now click on the lower left notebook like icon and then click move and then select the photos you want to move , then click move now it should be highlighting the right tab the external memory so choose the folder you want to move the photos to , or create a new folder , or just use the current folder that 's it now you will be able to access these photos via the computer usb cable method because they are now on the microsd card for further help please contact the device manufacturer hope this helps __eou__

hi arman cacao , 1 what is the make and model of your computer \? 2 was is getting charged till 100 earlier \? some steps to confirm whether or not the issue is your batter there are a few simple things you can do to see if the problem is with your battery , your charger , or the connection \( power port \) on your motherboard a you ll want to first remove the battery from your laptop b then verify the wall outlet you are using is fully functional with another electronic device c then connect your power cable to the charger , sometimes referred to as the brick , while inspecting the cable for any damage or exposed wires d then connect the charger to your laptop s power port e power the computer on when using strictly ac power f if your computer is working as intended then your battery is most likely headed for battery heaven and will need to be replaced if your computer does not work then there may be an issue with the charger or the power port on your computer you will want to double check all connections , and the power source \( wall outlet \) you are using if the problem persists this may be a sign of a faulty charger or the computers power port you will also want to check the port on the computer , were your power cable plugs in , ensuring that the power pin is not bent or damaged if the issue appears to be with the cable you will need to obtain another cable for testing purposes if the issue appears to be with the power port you will want to contact your computer manufacture for further assistance you may refer battery meter frequently asked questions http windows microsoft com en us windows7 battery meter frequently asked questions conserving battery power http windows microsoft com en us windows7 conserving battery power solutions to common battery problems http windows microsoft com en us windows7 solutions to common battery problems how accurate is the battery meter \? http windows microsoft com en us windows7 how accurate is the battery meter __eou__

just noticed you 'd responded to this what that typically means is that the 6 key on your keyboard appears to the system as pressed , possibly either stuck in the down position or somehow shorted by something that dropped into the area below the keys most often today this will be due to a liquid spill of something containing sugar or syrup , since this contains enough electrical conductivity to make the key appear to be pressed or otherwise simply cause the key to stick in a pressed position as it slowly dries both the laptop i'm writing this on and the previous one had this happen at least once with lemonade , which eventually caused the sticky keys problem i described above the older model was so bad i ordered a replacement from dell and replaced it myself , fortunately at a cost of only 29 plus shipping on this more expensive backlit laptop , i had the time to disassemble and remove the keyboard first , then used clean running water for several minutes to thoroughly flush out the spilled liquid , dry it completely using first a towel and then leaving it overnight to air dry one key does still occasionally stick slightly in humid weather , making an audible squishing sound , but not enough to truly cause more than minor annoyance it 's possible the problem is just something metal under the keys , but most laptops today do n't allow for this , so that 's why i 'd suspect a liquid spill as most likely erika __eou__
thank you erika __eou__

last year , facebook announced an update to their graph api that will impact microsoft apps and services facebook s graph api is the tool that we use to connect your microsoft account to facebook it brings contact information from your facebook friends into outlook com and the windows people app , keeps those contacts up to date , and provides options in apps and services like photo gallery , movie maker , and onedrive com to share to facebook we collectively refer to these features as facebook connect due to changes in facebook s latest api , microsoft will no longer support facebook connect if you ve connected facebook to your microsoft account , your facebook contacts will stop syncing to outlook com or the people app on your windows devices , and the sharing options to facebook may stop working as early as june 9th a comprehensive list of impacted features can be found here __eou__

hi , i am creating a document with many vector images involving numerous effects i draw vector images in inkscape , and then convert them in emf format for use in ms word the problem is that many effects like gradient effect and clipping are lost in the process of conversion and the emf illustration is no longer comparable to original svg image the use of vector image is very important and it is very unlikely that i would use a raster image \( unless the illustration used is a picture \) i 've searched the internet for questions asking solutions to same problem , many people recommended the use of power point to create image and then save them as emf i have no problem doing that until i can perform all the basic operation that can be done in inkscape \( effects like clipping and masking etc \) and there is a clear documentation available on line for use of ms drawing tools in power point if there is an independent software that creates images in emf format by default , that would be helpful too __eou__

hello amber , powerpoint is not an ideal program to create an advanced emf files if you want the program dedicated to create emf files then you may have to search online for any programs available to achieve this for any office related queries , you may post in this community and we are here to help you thank you __eou__

thanks for the reply stephanie , my main query was for an alternate to emf format , because even opensource programs like apache office has multiple vector graphic format support \( including the original svg \) , and since microsoft is such a giant in computer programs , especially ms office word is such an advanced wysiwyg word processing engine , i naturally assumed that it must have vector format that is more compatible with vector designing softwares like illustrator and inkscape as for dedicated emf graphic designing software , i have tried to search for it but could not find it , and i was hoping that somebody in ms community might help me out , certainly i am not the only one having this problem regards , uzairamber __eou__

any software that produces emf will likely have the same kinds of problems emf wmf graphics are fairly primitive and do n't include the ability to handle things like gradient fills , soft edges shadows and the like instead , programs that export emf have to perform workarounds to preserve a gradient , they 'll export gazillions of rectangles or polygons that , together , look like a single gradient filled shape editing these \? a nightmare ! i would suggest this workflow draw your graphics in any program that works well for you , but stick with simple shapes and lines do n't do any gradient fills or other fancy effects export as emf , import the emf into powerpoint , ungroup it and then apply any effects you like to the shapes once you do this , the graphic will be in native ms office format you can copy paste it from ppt to word and it should retain all of its characteristics you might , in fact , be able to import the emf directly into word , ungroup and apply effects there since ppt is the tool i use most often , i 'd rather work there and then copy to word , but if going directly to word works well for you , leave ppt out of the equation entirely __eou__

hi christy , thanks for the reply the workaround you suggested was really helpful could you clarify one point for me will i be able to perform clippings in powerpoint what i mean from clipping is that it acts similar to cropping image , but with much more control \( and dynamic \) one can define a shape to extracted from the original image and crop every thing else \( for example , the image you made is a rectangular vector image and you just want the circular image of a part , you can clip that image by drawing a circle over the part you wish to extract , then select both the image and the circle , and apply clipping effect \) regards , uzairamber __eou__

ppt does n't have a clipping function in quite the same sense that , say , corel draw and probably adobe illustrator do you ca n't define a clipping path , use it to clip another shape or shapes , and later adjust the clipping path to hide or reveal more of the clipped graphics but you can use the merge shapes command on the format insert shapes area to do a one time clip \( ie , you can use intersect to combine an image , for example with a shape and end up with the image clipped to the shape boundaries as a new shape that replaces the original shapes \) __eou__

thanks for the answer , christy i 'll try out your tips , and see how it goes if its too much of a hassle , maybe i 'll switch to apache openoffice it supports the svg format , and the only thing i 'll regret would be losing a nice ui of ms office __eou__

hi ! i think the workaround is a good idea if you have plenty of time and not a lot of graphics i'm working on a major document project requiring close to 600 graphics in the next month so this workaround is not going to be useful and would actually double the workload not to mention would probably be better if \( ugh \) i just create originally in powerpoint \( not fond of \) i'm currently using illustrator 2017 on a windows 10 system the requirements say they want the word document in 2010 format and a pdf that is 100 editable including the graphics i'm saving out vector art in emf format but they look really really bad lines get jacked , curves get pixelated etc yes we 're using bevels and some gradients \( only as necessary \) we 're also getting odd artifacts on the emf \( white borders for no apparent reason \) that are confusing also noted that we cannot open emf files in photoshop for quick trims \( of those white borders \) \( grrrr \) any help at all on suggesting how we get vector ai files exported out for insertion into word and subsequent editable pdf formatting would be greatly appreciated since i'm still in the early production stages but am facing a total sunami of art in the next week or so eeek ! \) __eou__

i'm not an ai user but in the past i 've seen the problem with curves and such getting pixelated \( actually , they 're being rendered as a series of short lines , not getting pixelated , but the effect is similar \) the fix there seems to be to make the shapes as big as possible in ai before exporting to emf or at least this is how it used to work apparently ai breaks curves into xx segments per point or inch or whatever the bigger you make the graphic , the more segments you get , so the smoother the line as far as gradients , my experience has been that you 're better off leaving things flat colored in ai then ungrouping and applying gradients in ppt otherwise , the gradient is liable to turn into a skillion individual shapes , making editing a nightmare as to the white borders , not sure , but quite often \( i 'd say always , in my experience \) emfs include a background object ungroup the emf after inserting it into ppt , select the b g object , delete it , then regroup the remaining shapes i ca n't really say what might help to make the pdf editable it 'd depend on what tools are used and what type of editing is needed the above suggestions will probably help , at least somewhat but ca n't ai save directly to pdf \? why go through word ppt at all \? __eou__

hi wjn101 , 1 since when are you facing this issue \? 2 did you make any changes on your computer \? 3 does this issue occur with all the programs or any particular program \? method 1 step 1 i would suggest you to boot the computer into safe mode and check if the issue occurs there , here are the steps refer advanced startup options including safe mode http windows microsoft com en us windows vista start your computer in safe mode step 2 if the issue does not occur in safe mode , you can try performing clean boot and check if it helps , putting your system in clean boot state helps in identifying if any third party applications or startup items are causing the issue if yes , you may have to contact the program manufacturer for any updates or uninstall and re install the program refer the following microsoft kb article for more information on how to troubleshoot a problem by performing a clean boot in windows vista or in windows 7 how to troubleshoot a problem by performing a clean boot in windows vista or in windows 7 http support microsoft com kb 929135 note after troubleshooting , make sure to put the computer to start as usual as mentioned in step 7 in the above kb article method 2 try creating new user account and check if the issue occurs , here is the link http windows microsoft com en us windows vista fix a corrupted user profile __eou__

i have a table of data it is several hundred rows i show the min , max and mean of a particular column is there a way , in addition to getting the answer , to highlight \( different color or background \) where it is in the column \? it would save time trying to find it thanks __eou__

conditional formatting highlight cell rules equal to in the box that opens up , put the cell reference of the cell with your min max mean displayed so if you have your min in e42 and your max in e44 , you would put e42 in your condition , set highlight to red , then do it again and put e44 in your condition and set highlight to yellow , etc i just verified that conditional formatting can display different formats for different rules hope it helps , aaron __eou__

aaron , thank you for your reply however , apparently i was not clear in what i am trying to do your solution does highlight the number in the max or min cell what i would like to do \( if possible \) is highlight the answer in the data column where it appears for example , if the min is 324 i would like that number highlighted in the data table so it wo n't be hard to find __eou__

i think aaron means , in the cells in the column with numbers , add three conditional formatting rules to each cell you can create the rules in one cell and then copy paste special formats to the other cells in the column one rule checks if the cell 's value is equal to the cell that contains the min of the column and applies the color the second rule checks if the cell 's value is equal to the cell that contains the max of the column and applies that color the third does the same for the average so only two to three cells would be colored in the column of numbers __eou__
what cells did you apply the conditional formatting to \? if you did n't apply the formatting to the area you want to have highlighted , it wo n't highlight that area thanks , aaron __eou__

if a graphic is wrapped , word automatically creates the caption in a text box if the graphic is in line with text , the caption is ordinary paragraph text if the graphics in question are not wrapped , then obviously the text boxes are unneeded in older versions of word , there was an option to convert the text box to a frame , and you could then select remove frame in the format frame dialog in word 2010 , i think you 'll just have to cut the text from the text box , paste it into a new paragraph \( in the caption style \) , and then delete the empty text box it looks like you 've got just five to do , so perhaps that wo n't be too onerous __eou__

with the description , i understand that you are experiencing problem with touch screen it seems like driver is missing under device manager i will certainly help you to fix the problem however , i would appreciate if you could help me with more information to better understand the issue and provide you a solution 1 what is the make and model of your computer \? 2 which rt device are you using this usually happens when you try to install the driver however due to any failure driver do not installs successfully i would suggest you please try these steps to fix the problem if you are using surface rt device then you may follow the suggestion in the below mentioned article https www microsoft com surface en us support hardware and drivers troubleshoot the surface touchscreen \? os windows 8 1 rt update 3 undefined method 1 run the hardware and device troubleshooter the hardware and device troubleshooter is an automated tool which checks the hardware connection on the computer for any known issues and provides the details on how to fix them follow these steps to run the troubleshooter a \) press windows key r keys from the keyboard in the run box , type control b \) control panel will open up , now click on troubleshooting c \) in the troubleshooting window , click on view all on the left pane d \) click on hardware and device e \) click on advanced and then click on run as administrator f \) click next and follow the on screen instructions to complete the troubleshooting process method 2 try to install the compatible driver or hardware follow these steps to install the compatible drivers which was working fine before and check if that helps a \) press windows key r keys from the keyboard in the run box , type ncpa cpl b \) under device manager expand the human interface devices c \) right click on the 12c hiid file and click on update driver software then click on browse my computer for driver software d \) click on let me pick from a list of device drivers on my computer e \) now under show compatible hardware you will see the list of drivers you may choose the recent driver and click next and check if that helps hope this information is helpful please write back to us if you need any further assistance , we 'll be glad to assist you regards ravi kumarrenee __eou__

assume the problematic column is column c in the next available column , say in row 2 put in the formula len \( trim \( c2 \) \) and drag fill down then filter on this column for the value 1 now if you select column c , you should be able to clear those cells as only the visible cells should be affected by default you can then remove the filter and clear the column with the formulas regards , cynthia ogilvy __eou__

in the following , i 'll assume that the first row in the worksheet contains column headers \( field names \) let 's say that column k is the column you want to look at insert an empty column immediately to the right of column k , i e in column l enter a title such as length in cell l1 enter the following formula in cell l2 len \( k2 \) fill or copy down from l2 to the last row with data click in cell l1 on the home tab of the ribbon , in the editing group , click sort filter filter click the filter dropdown arrow in l1 clear the \( select all \) check box , then tick the check box for the value 1 click ok the rows with length other than 1 will be hidden select from k2 down to the last used row in column k , then press delete click sort filter filter to turn off the filter you can now delete the inserted column \( column l \) , we do n't need it anymore __eou__

in layman term , bing webmaster tool is an seo webmaster tool for bing search engines , which allows webmasters to add their websites to the bing index crawler it helps to track and improve seo and performance of your site , which would bring more traffic to your sites as a webmaster of your website , you should be knowing the areas where your site is lacking and attention needed to improve in case of any problem in crawling your site via bing search , you should be able to track down those pages easily and will be notified in webmaster tool below are some key features of webmaster tool backlink data it helps to track the backlinks for your site \( external sites linking back to your site \) crawl issues allows webmasters to discover potential issues with your site like 404 \( page not found \) , blocked url , unsupported content types , etc real time stats it provides real time statistics about website traffic , shows all the data required to analyze your website traffic it also shows the search keyword users searched on bing which directed to your website seo reports discover the areas where your site is lacking and require some work to comply with seo best practices sitemaps add sitemaps of your site so that bing can crawl for the pages and include it in their index it also identifies if there is any problem with the sitemap and will report the same in webmaster dashboard besides of above there are many more features that are available on the bing webmaster tool how to add site into bing webmaster tool 1 you need sign in into bing webmaster tool and add your site and verify your ownership http www bing com webmaster help how to verify ownership of your site afcfefc6 2 go to configure my site sitemap , add your site sitemap and submit this will tell bing to crawl your webpage and include in bing search engine once sitemap is submitted , it may take time to crawl you should be able to see your site stats and important notification on bing webmaster tool let me know if you have any concern or queries on the same __eou__

we are using a large workbook with multiple sheets to capture similar and add new data \( different purposes \) there are 3 columns \( person 's name , agency , topic \) that we would like linked across 2 sheets and then be able to add , change or sort data in each one while maintaining the data integrity of the row dummy data example 1st sheet participants name agency topic comments priority contact snoopy doghouse animals smells funny 3 mickey disney mice catch 1 2nd sheet calendar name agency topic contacted status dates available snoopy doghouse animals yes arriving friday mickey disney mice no unknown i can link the first 3 columns , but if we add data to the others and then sort the 1st sheet , the data linked becomes mismatched with the data entered for each person on the 2nd sheet is there anyway to prevent this while allowing the data to be sorted \? thanks , lisa __eou__

the value in a2 \( snoopy \) of the calendar sheet needs to be manually entered this can be done using a data validation list which refers to column a of the participants sheet columns b c in the calendar sheet need to be formulas like this in b2 vlookup \( a2 , participants ! a c , column \( participants ! b 1 \) , false \) in c2 vlookup \( a2 , participants ! a c , column \( participants ! c 1 \) , false \) that way if the participants sheet is sorted the calendar sheet will still look up the correct data hope this helps emily __eou__

i will play with that and see how it works i was trying to work with vlookup , but did n't know about keeping the first column unlinked bad aspect is this is really large , so the name column could potentially have 10 , 000 entries thanks , lisa __eou__

i realised my example did n't make sense with the originals , so i corrected it to the below if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes1 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes2 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes3 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes4 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes5 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes6 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes7 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes8 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes9 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes9 if mergefield scorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes10 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno1 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno2 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno3 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno4 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno5 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno6 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno7 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno8 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno9 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno10 __eou__

it is doing that because every if field is in its own paragraph , and word still displays prints the paragraph mark if you want all the doubleyes doubleno values on one line , you can put all the if fields on a single line , e g if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes1 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes2 if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes3 etc if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno1 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno2 if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno3 etc \( if you need the values to be separate , put spaces or whatever between the if fields \) in this case , you could perhaps simplify it by doing one test for each value of iscorrect if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes1 mergefield doubleyes2 mergefield doubleyes3 etc if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno1 mergefield doubleno2 mergefield doubleno3 etc sometimes it is hard to read lots of fields on a single line , but if you put new paragraphs inside the if field braces , they wil not appear in the output \( but they will cause the display to change quite radically whenever you switch between field code view and field results view \) e g if mergefield iscorrect 0 mergefield doubleyes1 mergefield doubleyes2 mergefield doubleyes3 etc if mergefield iscorrect 1 mergefield doubleno1 mergefield doubleno2 mergefield doubleno3 etc __eou__

hello virginia , when a computer device will not boot to the windows desktop screen , you can force activate the advanced startup options menu \( aso \) in the following manner power up the device , wait for the manufacturer 's logo screen to appear , then immediately hard shut down \( hold the power button down until the led light shuts off \) repeat this process 2 3 times , until the aso menu activates the aso menu will offer a variety of recovery options you can try to get your device running again regards , wayneaustin __eou__

hi , i recently replaced a broken nokia 920 windows mobile 8 with another , used 920 to hold me over until my at t contract is up and i can upgrade more affordably the only problem with switching to the new phone is that all my bing health and fitness app gps tracker history is gone , which is weird because when i set up the app \( on both the old phone and the new phone \) , i set it to connect to my windows live account \( or whatever that 's called these days \) and thought the data was stored on the cloud somewhere , not my phone but , when i view the gps tracker history on the new phone , it says , no workouts to show what happened to my history and how can i get it back \? __eou__

hi , i believe the information is stored in the cloud and should be accessible synced to the new phone using a removable storage card you can move the data from the first phone to the media card , and then simply put the card in the second phone to access the data if the media cards are of a different format , you may be able to buy a card reader for your computer , move the data from the first phone to the computer , then move it to the media card for the second phone ask your mobile service provider if they provide a backup service contact data look for infrared ports \( ip \) on the phones many pda style phones have them this feature enables you to set the phones next to one another and literally beam data from one phone to the other check if the phones have mini usb ports if so , you may be able to connect the phones and transfer data that way email the data files from one phone to the other if the phones have email capabilities ehow com __eou__

thanks , carolyn here 's what i did 1 sign up for microsoft health vault 2 go to the healthvault tab page of the bing health fitness app settings , and connect to healthvault there 3 all data from the old phone will be stored on the cloud 4 refresh the healthvault web site on your desktop or restart your phone to see all your exercises sync 'd in the gps tracker and online additional info if helpful the bing health fitness app data is not saved locally on the phone , so most of the suggestions in smittychat 's response above did n't work \( sorry \) here 's where the confusion stems when you open the health fitness app , if you go to the bottom right and expand the menu options , the app gives you the option to connect to microsoft account it 's not clear to me where the data goes when you do that , but i never found it again but , if from that same expanded menu you select settings , instead of microsoft account , there 's a healthvault tab page that lets you connect to healthvault so that when you sign in to health vault \( on the phone or desktop \) you can access your exercise history under measurements history for any product team folks reading this , i recommend making this more intuitive finally , apologies , i signed in as my wife , above , even though i am the one with the question \) __eou__

it sounds like you 're referring to the bing app that appears by default on the windows 8 start screen , correct \? it 's possible that the app was just unpinned from your start screen the first thing you might try is to right click on the start screen or swipe up from the bottom of the screen and click the all apps view here you should see a comprehensive list of all apps installed on your device if you find bing here , then you can just tap hold to pin it to the start screen again it 's also possible that the app was accidentally uninstalled bing is a windows store \( metro \) app , not a conventional windows program , so it cannot be managed through the control panel instead , you should check the windows store just open the store app , search for bing , and it will tell you whether or not it 's already installed on your device if not , you should be able to reinstall it from there it 's a free app , so that should take care of it if you 're using the windows 8 1 preview \( or the rtm \) , be advised that the bing app no longer exists in this release the bing app will not appear in the windows 8 1 store instead , bing has been integrated directly into the search hero , which is accessible from the search charm on the charms bar when you swipe from the right side of the screen \( or press win key c \) , tap search , and enter a search term while searching everywhere , your results will automatically incorporate results from bing there 's no longer a need for a separate app of course if you prefer a classic search experience , you can still pin the bing web page to the start screen just open ie , go to www bing com , tap favorites , and then tap pin to start you 'll get a big yellow live tile that just launches the site , shows trending topics , and basically functions like the aforementioned app and other tools , such as the bing desktop , can still be installed on the windows 8 1 desktop please let us know if that solves your issue thanks ! __eou__

i have win 7 as my main os , but to be able to use a program from xp that is n't compatible with win7 , i installed xp on another partition the installation was successful , but when i try to choose it at startup , it wo n't start i get the message windows root system 32hal dll i did a search on my xp partition , and that file was exactly in the place where the message said it should be any suggestions \? __eou__

did you set the hard disk mode to ide \? in order to install windows xp on the partition you created , you will need to boot into your bios and set the hard disk mode to ide after you have set the hard disk ide mode , you can proceed to install windows xp on the partition you created insert your windows xp cd , then restart your computer when prompted to boot from the cd , do so this requires pressing any key on your keyboard windows xp will go through its setup process once you arrive at the welcome setup , press enter on your keyboard to begin the setup process press f8 on your keyboard to accept the license agreement select the partition select format the partition using the ntfs file system press f on your keyboard to begin the formatting installation files will now be copied to your hard disk your system will be restarted , windows xp setup will continue after windows xp installs successfully , you will not be able to boot into windows 7 this is where the recovery disc for windows 7 comes in 1 put the windows 7 recovery disc installation disc into the disc drive , and then start the computer 2 press a key when the message indicating press any key to boot from cd or dvd appears 3 select a language , a time , a currency , and a keyboard or another input method , and then click next 4 click repair your computer 5 click the operating system that you want to repair , and then click next 6 in the system recovery options dialog box , click command prompt 7 type sfc scannow , and then press enter after you have repaired your windows 7 installation and try to boot it , you will notice that windows 7 does not boot boot into the bios again and set the hard disk mode to sata you will now be able to boot into windows 7 again after doing that , download easybcd and add a boot entry for windows xp to the windows 7 boot manager easybcd by neosmart technologies would be your answer , it provides a graphical front end to the bcdedit command line that makes it easy for you to define start up settings and edit boot entries on the new windowsboot manager http neosmart net dl php \? id 1 the next step now is make it possible for windows 7 to boot in ide mode here are the instructions for doing that http www vistax64 com general discussion 271218 switch ahci ide tutorial howto html welcome all , so let me explain i installed windows 7 with ahci set from bios , but after that i wanted to use ide \( becose it boots faster \) and when i set ide from bios , the windows 7 loading screan camed upp and bsod \( blue screen of death \) with an error code 0x0000005b , i tryed the regedit trick by setting in the hkey local machinesystemcurrentcontrolsetservicesmsahci and then in the right pan the start value from 0 i set it to 1 and it supposed to be working but it was a failiure , it still did the bsod and i was so pissed of , i wanted to make it work and i did it ! here are the pases 1 \) i assume u have installed windows vista or windows 7 with ahci set from bios ! 2 \) download my registry fix \( to add the ide keys to regeditor \) simply apply the key 3 \) now the manually regedit part go to hkey local machine system currentcontrolset services msahci hkey local machine system currentcontrolset services iastor hkey local machine system currentcontrolset services iastorv and in thease three keys in the right pan u will find a key named start change at all three \( msahci , iastor , iastorv \) values from 0 to 1 now navigate to hkey local machine system currentcontrolset services pciide , then change the start value to 0 4 \) now u are allmost done , restart your computer laptop , and go to bios and set from ahci to ide ! ! ! , save settings in bios and restart 5 \) windows will be loading , and voila ! ! ! no bsod ! ! ! , windows vista seven will install new ide drivers and u will see in windows device manager that you dont have ahci drivers anymore , u have ide drivers ! 6 \) it will prompt for another restart , just restart it and u will be happy the first option i would recommend , if you really need to run windows xp is to use windows virtual pc with windows xp mode , you will need to upgrade to windows 7 professional or ultimate in order to gain access to windows xp mode windows 7 anytime upgrade frequently asked questions http windows microsoft com en us windows7 windows anytime upgrade frequently asked questions windows 7 anytime upgrade features http windows microsoft com en us windows7 products features windows anytime upgrade or , if you have a full retail version of windows xp professional or xp home , you can download the free windows virtual pc and use your own license http techingiteasy wordpress com 2012 05 02 how to use virtualization softwarewindows virtual pc the other option , if you already have a windows xp license , is to dual boot with windows 7 the following instructions will show how to dual boot windows 7 and xp on your machine instead of replacing one with the other it is important you have a reinstallation or repair disc in case you need to reinstall or repair your windows 7 installation the following article will show you how to create a repair disc http notebooks com 2011 02 09 how to create a system repair disc in windows 7 __eou__

and then press enter c in the currently installed programs list , select bing desktop and then click remove d follow the on screen instructions to uninstall bing desktop from your computer note before proceeding to the next steps , please unhide your folders first to unhide folders , on your local folder , press alt tools folder option view show hidden files , folders and drives 2 browse your computer to c program files \( x86 \) then delete the bing desktop installer a click start b type c program files on the start search box c hit enter d look for the bing desktop folder e right click the bing desktop installer folder and click delete 3 remove bing desktop files in program data folder a click start b be sure to unhide all your folders c type 'c ' d select program data e then , open microsoft f delete the bing desktop folder 4 remove bing desktop files from the windows registry important the steps below contain information about modifying the registry before you modify the registry , make sure to back it up and make sure that you understand how to restore the registry if a problem occurs for information about how to back up , restore , and edit the registry , visit the following web site http support microsoft com kb 256986 a click the 'start' button , type regedit in the search text box , and then press 'enter' b in the 'user account control' dialog box , click 'continue' c expand the hkey current usersoftwaremicrosoft folder d underneath the microsoft folder , make sure that the msn toolbar , msn apps and bing bar folders are not present if the folders are present , right click on each folder then click 'delete' e expand the hkey local machine softwaremicrosoft folder f underneath the microsoft folder , make sure that the msn toolbar and msn apps folders are not present if the folders are present , right click on each folder then click 'delete' g close the registry editor window 5 to delete the bing the app data folders a click start type userprofile on the search for programs and files box then press enter on your keyboard b on the pop up window , locate the appdata folder if the folder is not present , make sure to show all hidden files and folders check this option by accessing organize folder and search options view tab c after opening the appdata folder , open local microsoft d locate the bing desktop folder then delete it 6 install the bing desktop a launch internet explorer the bing bar will not work with any other browser b download the installer by going to http www bing com explore desktopto install the latest how to auto fill in sequence numbering on a filtered data excel spreadsheet \? __eou__

you can do this if you have a range that is not an excel table if you are using a table , you need to convert it to a range first filter the range select the cells where you want the auto numbering to go , for example the visible cells in column b , starting in the first visible row below the header hit f5 special visible cells only ok if the first visible row of data is in row 43 , enter this formula into b43 but do n't hit enter yet ! max \( b 1 b42 \) 1 the formula refers to all rows above in this example , row 43 is the first visible data row in the filtered range , so the formula refers to rows 1 to 42 hold down the ctrl key and hit enter the formula will now be applied to all the visible cells now you can remove the filter to see that the consecutive numbering has only been applied to the rows that you had previously showing does that help \? cheers , lori __eou__

hi , try this 1 suppose your data is in range a1 c500 headings are in a1 c1 2 you wish to enter the headings in column a 3 type 1 in cell a2 4 enter this formula in cell a3 and copy down till cell a500 subtotal \( 3 , b 2 b2 \) 1 i have assumed that column b will not have any blanks if there are blanks in column b , then change the column in the formula to one in which there are no blanks now when you apply a filter , the numbers in column a will appear sequential hope this helps __eou__

hello tinavision , i understand the inconvenience you have faced cookies are little pieces of information that skype , or your internet browser , may store on your computer 's hard drive cookies enable skype to this information may be analyzed by third parties on our behalf , but your details are not sold on to anyone else the help menu on the toolbar of most browsers will tell you how to prevent your browser from accepting new cookies , how to have the browser notify you when you receive a new cookie , and how to disable cookies altogether please bear in mind that if you choose to disable cookies , some personalized services may not be available we highly advised you to accept skype browser cookies using this steps below 1 open skype privacy 2 check the box that says accept skype browser cookies 3 click on save hope this information helps us let me know if you need further assistance regards __eou__

to turn on and off focused inbox , please follow the steps below 1 \) open the windows 10 mail app 2 \) click the gear icon to open the settings 3 under settings , click reading 4 under focused inbox , select an account you want to apply the changes 5 turn on or off sort messages into focused and other what exactly is other you want to get rid of \? are you referring to merged inboxes \? you said you want just one inbox so if you have multiple accounts that would mean merged turn on merged inboxes in mail settings under manage accounts __eou__
